00289 GpuSatCollision::~GpuSatCollision()
00290 {
00291         
00292         if (m_findSeparatingAxisVertexFaceKernel)
00293                 clReleaseKernel(m_findSeparatingAxisVertexFaceKernel);
00294 
00295         if (m_findSeparatingAxisEdgeEdgeKernel)
00296                 clReleaseKernel(m_findSeparatingAxisEdgeEdgeKernel);
00297 
00298         if (m_findSeparatingAxisUnitSphereKernel)
00299                 clReleaseKernel(m_findSeparatingAxisUnitSphereKernel);
00300 
00301         if (m_mprPenetrationKernel)
00302                 clReleaseKernel(m_mprPenetrationKernel);
00303 
00304 
00305         if (m_findSeparatingAxisKernel)
00306                 clReleaseKernel(m_findSeparatingAxisKernel);
00307 
00308     if (m_findConcaveSeparatingAxisVertexFaceKernel)
00309         clReleaseKernel(m_findConcaveSeparatingAxisVertexFaceKernel);
00310 
00311     
00312     if (m_findConcaveSeparatingAxisEdgeEdgeKernel)
00313         clReleaseKernel(m_findConcaveSeparatingAxisEdgeEdgeKernel);
00314     
00315         if (m_findConcaveSeparatingAxisKernel)
00316                 clReleaseKernel(m_findConcaveSeparatingAxisKernel);
00317 
00318         if (m_findCompoundPairsKernel)
00319                 clReleaseKernel(m_findCompoundPairsKernel);
00320 
00321         if (m_processCompoundPairsKernel)
00322                 clReleaseKernel(m_processCompoundPairsKernel);
00323     
00324     if (m_findClippingFacesKernel)
00325         clReleaseKernel(m_findClippingFacesKernel);
00326    
00327     if (m_clipFacesAndFindContacts)
00328         clReleaseKernel(m_clipFacesAndFindContacts);
00329     if (m_newContactReductionKernel)
00330         clReleaseKernel(m_newContactReductionKernel);
00331         if (m_primitiveContactsKernel)
00332                 clReleaseKernel(m_primitiveContactsKernel);
00333     
00334         if (m_findConcaveSphereContactsKernel)
00335                 clReleaseKernel(m_findConcaveSphereContactsKernel);
00336 
00337         if (m_processCompoundPairsPrimitivesKernel)
00338                 clReleaseKernel(m_processCompoundPairsPrimitivesKernel);
00339 
00340         if (m_clipHullHullKernel)
00341                 clReleaseKernel(m_clipHullHullKernel);
00342         if (m_clipCompoundsHullHullKernel)
00343                 clReleaseKernel(m_clipCompoundsHullHullKernel);
00344 
00345         if (m_clipHullHullConcaveConvexKernel)
00346                 clReleaseKernel(m_clipHullHullConcaveConvexKernel);
00347 //      if (m_extractManifoldAndAddContactKernel)
00348         //      clReleaseKernel(m_extractManifoldAndAddContactKernel);
00349 
00350         if (m_bvhTraversalKernel)
00351                 clReleaseKernel(m_bvhTraversalKernel);
00352

00368 #define float4 b3Vector3
00369 #define make_float4(x,y,z,w) b3MakeVector3(x,y,z,w)
00370 
00371 float signedDistanceFromPointToPlane(const float4& point, const float4& planeEqn, float4* closestPointOnFace)
00372 {
00373         float4 n = planeEqn;
00374         n[3] = 0.f;
00375         float dist = dot3F4(n, point) + planeEqn[3];
00376         *closestPointOnFace = point - dist * n;
00377         return dist;
00378 }

00382 #define cross3(a,b) (a.cross(b))
00383 b3Vector3 transform(const b3Vector3* v, const b3Vector3* pos, const b3Quaternion* orn)
00384 {
00385         b3Transform tr;
00386         tr.setIdentity();
00387         tr.setOrigin(*pos);
00388         tr.setRotation(*orn);
00389         b3Vector3 res = tr(*v);
00390         return res;
00391 }

00393 
00394 inline bool IsPointInPolygon(const float4& p, 
00395                                                         const b3GpuFace* face,
00396                                                          const float4* baseVertex,
00397                                                         const  int* convexIndices,
00398                                                         float4* out)
00399 {
00400     float4 a;
00401     float4 b;
00402     float4 ab;
00403     float4 ap;
00404     float4 v;
00405 
00406         float4 plane = b3MakeVector3(face->m_plane.x,face->m_plane.y,face->m_plane.z,0.f);
00407         
00408         if (face->m_numIndices<2)
00409                 return false;
00410 
00411         
00412         float4 v0 = baseVertex[convexIndices[face->m_indexOffset + face->m_numIndices-1]];
00413         b = v0;
00414 
00415     for(unsigned i=0; i != face->m_numIndices; ++i)
00416     {
00417                 a = b;
00418                 float4 vi = baseVertex[convexIndices[face->m_indexOffset + i]];
00419                 b = vi;
00420         ab = b-a;
00421         ap = p-a;
00422         v = cross3(ab,plane);
00423 
00424         if (b3Dot(ap, v) > 0.f)
00425         {
00426             float ab_m2 = b3Dot(ab, ab);
00427             float rt = ab_m2 != 0.f ? b3Dot(ab, ap) / ab_m2 : 0.f;
00428             if (rt <= 0.f)
00429             {
00430                 *out = a;
00431             }
00432             else if (rt >= 1.f) 
00433             {
00434                 *out = b;
00435             }
00436             else
00437             {
00438                 float s = 1.f - rt;
00439                                 out[0].x = s * a.x + rt * b.x;
00440                                 out[0].y = s * a.y + rt * b.y;
00441                                 out[0].z = s * a.z + rt * b.z;
00442             }
00443             return false;
00444         }
00445     }
00446     return true;
00447 }
00448 
00449 #define normalize3(a) (a.normalize())
00450 
00451 
00452 int extractManifoldSequentialGlobal( const float4* p, int nPoints, const float4& nearNormal, b3Int4* contactIdx)
00453 {
00454         if( nPoints == 0 )
00455         return 0;
00456     
00457     if (nPoints <=4)
00458         return nPoints;
00459     
00460     
00461     if (nPoints >64)
00462         nPoints = 64;
00463     
00464         float4 center = b3MakeVector3(0,0,0,0);
00465         {
00466                 
00467                 for (int i=0;i<nPoints;i++)
00468                         center += p[i];
00469                 center /= (float)nPoints;
00470         }
00471     
00472         
00473     
00474         //      sample 4 directions
00475     
00476     float4 aVector = p[0] - center;
00477     float4 u = cross3( nearNormal, aVector );
00478     float4 v = cross3( nearNormal, u );
00479     u = normalize3( u );
00480     v = normalize3( v );
00481     
00482     
00483     //keep point with deepest penetration
00484     float minW= FLT_MAX;
00485     
00486     int minIndex=-1;
00487     
00488     float4 maxDots;
00489     maxDots.x = FLT_MIN;
00490     maxDots.y = FLT_MIN;
00491     maxDots.z = FLT_MIN;
00492     maxDots.w = FLT_MIN;
00493     
00494     //  idx, distance
00495     for(int ie = 0; ie<nPoints; ie++ )
00496     {
00497         if (p[ie].w<minW)
00498         {
00499             minW = p[ie].w;
00500             minIndex=ie;
00501         }
00502         float f;
00503         float4 r = p[ie]-center;
00504         f = dot3F4( u, r );
00505         if (f<maxDots.x)
00506         {
00507             maxDots.x = f;
00508             contactIdx[0].x = ie;
00509         }
00510         
00511         f = dot3F4( -u, r );
00512         if (f<maxDots.y)
00513         {
00514             maxDots.y = f;
00515             contactIdx[0].y = ie;
00516         }
00517         
00518         
00519         f = dot3F4( v, r );
00520         if (f<maxDots.z)
00521         {
00522             maxDots.z = f;
00523             contactIdx[0].z = ie;
00524         }
00525         
00526         f = dot3F4( -v, r );
00527         if (f<maxDots.w)
00528         {
00529             maxDots.w = f;
00530             contactIdx[0].w = ie;
00531         }
00532         
00533     }
00534     
00535     if (contactIdx[0].x != minIndex && contactIdx[0].y != minIndex && contactIdx[0].z != minIndex && contactIdx[0].w != minIndex)
00536     {
00537         //replace the first contact with minimum (todo: replace contact with least penetration)
00538         contactIdx[0].x = minIndex;
00539     }
00540     
00541     return 4;
00542     
00543 }

00548 
00549 
00550 inline void project(const b3ConvexPolyhedronData& hull,  const float4& pos, const b3Quaternion& orn, const float4& dir, const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Vector3>& vertices, b3Scalar& min, b3Scalar& max)
00551 {
00552         min = FLT_MAX;
00553         max = -FLT_MAX;
00554         int numVerts = hull.m_numVertices;
00555 
00556         const float4 localDir = b3QuatRotate(orn.inverse(),dir);
00557 
00558         b3Scalar offset = dot3F4(pos,dir);
00559 
00560         for(int i=0;i<numVerts;i++)
00561         {
00562                 //b3Vector3 pt = trans * vertices[m_vertexOffset+i];
00563                 //b3Scalar dp = pt.dot(dir);
00564                 //b3Vector3 vertex = vertices[hull.m_vertexOffset+i];
00565                 b3Scalar dp = dot3F4((float4&)vertices[hull.m_vertexOffset+i],localDir);
00566                 //b3Assert(dp==dpL);
00567                 if(dp < min)    min = dp;
00568                 if(dp > max)    max = dp;
00569         }
00570         if(min>max)
00571         {
00572                 b3Scalar tmp = min;
00573                 min = max;
00574                 max = tmp;
00575         }
00576         min += offset;
00577         max += offset;
00578 }
00579 
00580 
00581 static bool TestSepAxis(const b3ConvexPolyhedronData& hullA, const b3ConvexPolyhedronData& hullB, 
00582         const float4& posA,const b3Quaternion& ornA,
00583         const float4& posB,const b3Quaternion& ornB,
00584         const float4& sep_axis, const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Vector3>& verticesA,const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Vector3>& verticesB,b3Scalar& depth)
00585 {
00586         b3Scalar Min0,Max0;
00587         b3Scalar Min1,Max1;
00588         project(hullA,posA,ornA,sep_axis,verticesA, Min0, Max0);
00589         project(hullB,posB,ornB, sep_axis,verticesB, Min1, Max1);
00590 
00591         if(Max0<Min1 || Max1<Min0)
00592                 return false;
00593 
00594         b3Scalar d0 = Max0 - Min1;
00595         assert(d0>=0.0f);
00596         b3Scalar d1 = Max1 - Min0;
00597         assert(d1>=0.0f);
00598         depth = d0<d1 ? d0:d1;
00599         return true;
00600 }
00601 
00602 inline bool IsAlmostZero(const b3Vector3& v)
00603 {
00604         if(fabsf(v.x)>1e-6 || fabsf(v.y)>1e-6 || fabsf(v.z)>1e-6)       return false;
00605         return true;
00606 }
00607 
00608 
00609 static bool findSeparatingAxis( const b3ConvexPolyhedronData& hullA, const b3ConvexPolyhedronData& hullB, 
00610         const float4& posA1,
00611         const b3Quaternion& ornA,
00612         const float4& posB1,
00613         const b3Quaternion& ornB,
00614         const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Vector3>& verticesA,
00615         const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Vector3>& uniqueEdgesA, 
00616         const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3GpuFace>& facesA,
00617         const b3AlignedObjectArray<int>& indicesA,
00618         const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Vector3>& verticesB, 
00619         const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Vector3>& uniqueEdgesB, 
00620         const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3GpuFace>& facesB,
00621         const b3AlignedObjectArray<int>& indicesB,
00622 
00623         b3Vector3& sep)
00624 {
00625         B3_PROFILE("findSeparatingAxis");
00626 
00627         b3g_actualSATPairTests++;
00628         float4 posA = posA1;
00629         posA.w = 0.f;
00630         float4 posB = posB1;
00631         posB.w = 0.f;
00632 //#ifdef TEST_INTERNAL_OBJECTS
00633         float4 c0local = (float4&)hullA.m_localCenter;
00634         float4 c0 = transform(&c0local, &posA, &ornA);
00635         float4 c1local = (float4&)hullB.m_localCenter;
00636         float4 c1 = transform(&c1local,&posB,&ornB);
00637         const float4 deltaC2 = c0 - c1;
00638 //#endif
00639 
00640         b3Scalar dmin = FLT_MAX;
00641         int curPlaneTests=0;
00642 
00643         int numFacesA = hullA.m_numFaces;
00644         // Test normals from hullA
00645         for(int i=0;i<numFacesA;i++)
00646         {
00647                 const float4& normal = (float4&)facesA[hullA.m_faceOffset+i].m_plane;
00648                 float4 faceANormalWS = b3QuatRotate(ornA,normal);
00649 
00650                 if (dot3F4(deltaC2,faceANormalWS)<0)
00651                         faceANormalWS*=-1.f;
00652 
00653                 curPlaneTests++;
00654 #ifdef TEST_INTERNAL_OBJECTS
00655                 gExpectedNbTests++;
00656                 if(gUseInternalObject && !TestInternalObjects(transA,transB, DeltaC2, faceANormalWS, hullA, hullB, dmin))
00657                         continue;
00658                 gActualNbTests++;
00659 #endif
00660 
00661                 
00662                 b3Scalar d;
00663                 if(!TestSepAxis( hullA, hullB, posA,ornA,posB,ornB,faceANormalWS, verticesA, verticesB,d))
00664                         return false;
00665 
00666                 if(d<dmin)
00667                 {
00668                         dmin = d;
00669                         sep = (b3Vector3&)faceANormalWS;
00670                 }
00671         }
00672 
00673         int numFacesB = hullB.m_numFaces;
00674         // Test normals from hullB
00675         for(int i=0;i<numFacesB;i++)
00676         {
00677                 float4 normal = (float4&)facesB[hullB.m_faceOffset+i].m_plane;
00678                 float4 WorldNormal = b3QuatRotate(ornB, normal);
00679 
00680                 if (dot3F4(deltaC2,WorldNormal)<0)
00681                 {
00682                         WorldNormal*=-1.f;
00683                 }
00684                 curPlaneTests++;
00685 #ifdef TEST_INTERNAL_OBJECTS
00686                 gExpectedNbTests++;
00687                 if(gUseInternalObject && !TestInternalObjects(transA,transB,DeltaC2, WorldNormal, hullA, hullB, dmin))
00688                         continue;
00689                 gActualNbTests++;
00690 #endif
00691 
00692                 b3Scalar d;
00693                 if(!TestSepAxis(hullA, hullB,posA,ornA,posB,ornB,WorldNormal,verticesA,verticesB,d))
00694                         return false;
00695 
00696                 if(d<dmin)
00697                 {
00698                         dmin = d;
00699                         sep = (b3Vector3&)WorldNormal;
00700                 }
00701         }
00702 
00703         int curEdgeEdge = 0;
00704         // Test edges
00705         for(int e0=0;e0<hullA.m_numUniqueEdges;e0++)
00706         {
00707                 const float4& edge0 = (float4&) uniqueEdgesA[hullA.m_uniqueEdgesOffset+e0];
00708                 float4 edge0World = b3QuatRotate(ornA,(float4&)edge0);
00709 
00710                 for(int e1=0;e1<hullB.m_numUniqueEdges;e1++)
00711                 {
00712                         const b3Vector3 edge1 = uniqueEdgesB[hullB.m_uniqueEdgesOffset+e1];
00713                         float4 edge1World = b3QuatRotate(ornB,(float4&)edge1);
00714 
00715 
00716                         float4 crossje = cross3(edge0World,edge1World);
00717 
00718                         curEdgeEdge++;
00719                         if(!IsAlmostZero((b3Vector3&)crossje))
00720                         {
00721                                 crossje = normalize3(crossje);
00722                                 if (dot3F4(deltaC2,crossje)<0)
00723                                         crossje*=-1.f;
00724 
00725 
00726 #ifdef TEST_INTERNAL_OBJECTS
00727                                 gExpectedNbTests++;
00728                                 if(gUseInternalObject && !TestInternalObjects(transA,transB,DeltaC2, Cross, hullA, hullB, dmin))
00729                                         continue;
00730                                 gActualNbTests++;
00731 #endif
00732 
00733                                 b3Scalar dist;
00734                                 if(!TestSepAxis( hullA, hullB, posA,ornA,posB,ornB,crossje, verticesA,verticesB,dist))
00735                                         return false;
00736 
00737                                 if(dist<dmin)
00738                                 {
00739                                         dmin = dist;
00740                                         sep = (b3Vector3&)crossje;
00741                                 }
00742                         }
00743                 }
00744 
00745         }
00746 
00747         
00748         if((dot3F4(-deltaC2,(float4&)sep))>0.0f)
00749                 sep = -sep;
00750 
00751         return true;
00752 }
00753 
00754 
00755 bool findSeparatingAxisEdgeEdge(        __global const b3ConvexPolyhedronData* hullA, __global const b3ConvexPolyhedronData* hullB, 
00756         const b3Float4& posA1,
00757         const b3Quat& ornA,
00758         const b3Float4& posB1,
00759         const b3Quat& ornB,
00760         const b3Float4& DeltaC2,
00761         __global const b3AlignedObjectArray<float4>& vertices, 
00762         __global const b3AlignedObjectArray<float4>& uniqueEdges, 
00763         __global const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3GpuFace>& faces,
00764         __global const b3AlignedObjectArray<int>&  indices,
00765         float4* sep,
00766         float* dmin)
00767 {
00768 //      int i = get_global_id(0);
00769 
00770         float4 posA = posA1;
00771         posA.w = 0.f;
00772         float4 posB = posB1;
00773         posB.w = 0.f;
00774 
00775         //int curPlaneTests=0;
00776 
00777         int curEdgeEdge = 0;
00778         // Test edges
00779         for(int e0=0;e0<hullA->m_numUniqueEdges;e0++)
00780         {
00781                 const float4 edge0 = uniqueEdges[hullA->m_uniqueEdgesOffset+e0];
00782                 float4 edge0World = b3QuatRotate(ornA,edge0);
00783 
00784                 for(int e1=0;e1<hullB->m_numUniqueEdges;e1++)
00785                 {
00786                         const float4 edge1 = uniqueEdges[hullB->m_uniqueEdgesOffset+e1];
00787                         float4 edge1World = b3QuatRotate(ornB,edge1);
00788 
00789 
00790                         float4 crossje = cross3(edge0World,edge1World);
00791 
00792                         curEdgeEdge++;
00793                         if(!IsAlmostZero(crossje))
00794                         {
00795                                 crossje = normalize3(crossje);
00796                                 if (dot3F4(DeltaC2,crossje)<0)
00797                                         crossje*=-1.f;
00798                                         
00799                                 float dist;
00800                                 bool result = true;
00801                                 {
00802                                         float Min0,Max0;
00803                                         float Min1,Max1;
00804                                         project(*hullA,posA,ornA,crossje,vertices, Min0, Max0);
00805                                         project(*hullB,posB,ornB,crossje,vertices, Min1, Max1);
00806                                 
00807                                         if(Max0<Min1 || Max1<Min0)
00808                                                 result = false;
00809                                 
00810                                         float d0 = Max0 - Min1;
00811                                         float d1 = Max1 - Min0;
00812                                         dist = d0<d1 ? d0:d1;
00813                                         result = true;
00814 
00815                                 }
00816                                 
00817 
00818                                 if(dist<*dmin)
00819                                 {
00820                                         *dmin = dist;
00821                                         *sep = crossje;
00822                                 }
00823                         }
00824                 }
00825 
00826         }
00827 
00828         
00829         if((dot3F4(-DeltaC2,*sep))>0.0f)
00830         {
00831                 *sep = -(*sep);
00832         }
00833         return true;
00834 }
00835 
00836 
00837 __inline float4 lerp3(const float4& a,const float4& b, float  t)
00838 {
00839         return b3MakeVector3(   a.x + (b.x - a.x) * t,
00840                                                 a.y + (b.y - a.y) * t,
00841                                                 a.z + (b.z - a.z) * t,
00842                                                 0.f);
00843 }
00844 
00845 
00846 // Clips a face to the back of a plane, return the number of vertices out, stored in ppVtxOut
00847 int clipFace(const float4* pVtxIn, int numVertsIn, float4& planeNormalWS,float planeEqWS, float4* ppVtxOut)
00848 {
00849         
00850         int ve;
00851         float ds, de;
00852         int numVertsOut = 0;
00853         if (numVertsIn < 2)
00854                 return 0;
00855 
00856         float4 firstVertex=pVtxIn[numVertsIn-1];
00857         float4 endVertex = pVtxIn[0];
00858         
00859         ds = dot3F4(planeNormalWS,firstVertex)+planeEqWS;
00860 
00861         for (ve = 0; ve < numVertsIn; ve++)
00862         {
00863                 endVertex=pVtxIn[ve];
00864 
00865                 de = dot3F4(planeNormalWS,endVertex)+planeEqWS;
00866 
00867                 if (ds<0)
00868                 {
00869                         if (de<0)
00870                         {
00871                                 // Start < 0, end < 0, so output endVertex
00872                                 ppVtxOut[numVertsOut++] = endVertex;
00873                         }
00874                         else
00875                         {
00876                                 // Start < 0, end >= 0, so output intersection
00877                                 ppVtxOut[numVertsOut++] = lerp3(firstVertex, endVertex,(ds * 1.f/(ds - de)) );
00878                         }
00879                 }
00880                 else
00881                 {
00882                         if (de<0)
00883                         {
00884                                 // Start >= 0, end < 0 so output intersection and end
00885                                 ppVtxOut[numVertsOut++] = lerp3(firstVertex, endVertex,(ds * 1.f/(ds - de)) );
00886                                 ppVtxOut[numVertsOut++] = endVertex;
00887                         }
00888                 }
00889                 firstVertex = endVertex;
00890                 ds = de;
00891         }
00892         return numVertsOut;
00893 }
00894 
00895 
00896 int clipFaceAgainstHull(const float4& separatingNormal, const b3ConvexPolyhedronData* hullA,  
00897         const float4& posA, const b3Quaternion& ornA, float4* worldVertsB1, int numWorldVertsB1,
00898         float4* worldVertsB2, int capacityWorldVertsB2,
00899         const float minDist, float maxDist,
00900         const b3AlignedObjectArray<float4>& verticesA,  const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3GpuFace>& facesA,  const b3AlignedObjectArray<int>& indicesA,
00901         //const float4* verticesB,      const b3GpuFace* facesB,        const int* indicesB,
00902         float4* contactsOut,
00903         int contactCapacity)
00904 {
00905         int numContactsOut = 0;
00906 
00907         float4* pVtxIn = worldVertsB1;
00908         float4* pVtxOut = worldVertsB2;
00909         
00910         int numVertsIn = numWorldVertsB1;
00911         int numVertsOut = 0;
00912 
00913         int closestFaceA=-1;
00914         {
00915                 float dmin = FLT_MAX;
00916                 for(int face=0;face<hullA->m_numFaces;face++)
00917                 {
00918                         const float4 Normal = b3MakeVector3(
00919                                 facesA[hullA->m_faceOffset+face].m_plane.x, 
00920                                 facesA[hullA->m_faceOffset+face].m_plane.y, 
00921                                 facesA[hullA->m_faceOffset+face].m_plane.z,0.f);
00922                         const float4 faceANormalWS = b3QuatRotate(ornA,Normal);
00923                 
00924                         float d = dot3F4(faceANormalWS,separatingNormal);
00925                         if (d < dmin)
00926                         {
00927                                 dmin = d;
00928                                 closestFaceA = face;
00929                         }
00930                 }
00931         }
00932         if (closestFaceA<0)
00933                 return numContactsOut;
00934 
00935         b3GpuFace polyA = facesA[hullA->m_faceOffset+closestFaceA];
00936 
00937         // clip polygon to back of planes of all faces of hull A that are adjacent to witness face
00938 //      int numContacts = numWorldVertsB1;
00939         int numVerticesA = polyA.m_numIndices;
00940         for(int e0=0;e0<numVerticesA;e0++)
00941         {
00942                 const float4 a = verticesA[hullA->m_vertexOffset+indicesA[polyA.m_indexOffset+e0]];
00943                 const float4 b = verticesA[hullA->m_vertexOffset+indicesA[polyA.m_indexOffset+((e0+1)%numVerticesA)]];
00944                 const float4 edge0 = a - b;
00945                 const float4 WorldEdge0 = b3QuatRotate(ornA,edge0);
00946                 float4 planeNormalA = make_float4(polyA.m_plane.x,polyA.m_plane.y,polyA.m_plane.z,0.f);
00947                 float4 worldPlaneAnormal1 = b3QuatRotate(ornA,planeNormalA);
00948 
00949                 float4 planeNormalWS1 = -cross3(WorldEdge0,worldPlaneAnormal1);
00950                 float4 worldA1 = transform(&a,&posA,&ornA);
00951                 float planeEqWS1 = -dot3F4(worldA1,planeNormalWS1);
00952                 
00953                 float4 planeNormalWS = planeNormalWS1;
00954                 float planeEqWS=planeEqWS1;
00955                 
00956                 //clip face
00957                 //clipFace(*pVtxIn, *pVtxOut,planeNormalWS,planeEqWS);
00958                 numVertsOut = clipFace(pVtxIn, numVertsIn, planeNormalWS,planeEqWS, pVtxOut);
00959 
00960                 //btSwap(pVtxIn,pVtxOut);
00961                 float4* tmp = pVtxOut;
00962                 pVtxOut = pVtxIn;
00963                 pVtxIn = tmp;
00964                 numVertsIn = numVertsOut;
00965                 numVertsOut = 0;
00966         }
00967 
00968         
00969         // only keep points that are behind the witness face
00970         {
00971                 float4 localPlaneNormal  = make_float4(polyA.m_plane.x,polyA.m_plane.y,polyA.m_plane.z,0.f);
00972                 float localPlaneEq = polyA.m_plane.w;
00973                 float4 planeNormalWS = b3QuatRotate(ornA,localPlaneNormal);
00974                 float planeEqWS=localPlaneEq-dot3F4(planeNormalWS,posA);
00975                 for (int i=0;i<numVertsIn;i++)
00976                 {
00977                         float depth = dot3F4(planeNormalWS,pVtxIn[i])+planeEqWS;
00978                         if (depth <=minDist)
00979                         {
00980                                 depth = minDist;
00981                         }
00982                         if (numContactsOut<contactCapacity)
00983                         {
00984                                 if (depth <=maxDist)
00985                                 {
00986                                         float4 pointInWorld = pVtxIn[i];
00987                                         //resultOut.addContactPoint(separatingNormal,point,depth);
00988                                         contactsOut[numContactsOut++] = b3MakeVector3(pointInWorld.x,pointInWorld.y,pointInWorld.z,depth);
00989                                         //printf("depth=%f\n",depth);
00990                                 }
00991                         } else
00992                         {
00993                                 b3Error("exceeding contact capacity (%d,%df)\n", numContactsOut,contactCapacity);
00994                         }
00995                 }
00996         }
00997 
00998         return numContactsOut;
00999 }
01000 
01001 
01002 
01003 static int      clipHullAgainstHull(const float4& separatingNormal, 
01004         const b3ConvexPolyhedronData& hullA, const b3ConvexPolyhedronData& hullB, 
01005         const float4& posA, const b3Quaternion& ornA,const float4& posB, const b3Quaternion& ornB, 
01006         float4* worldVertsB1, float4* worldVertsB2, int capacityWorldVerts,
01007         const float minDist, float maxDist,
01008         const b3AlignedObjectArray<float4>& verticesA,  const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3GpuFace>& facesA,  const b3AlignedObjectArray<int>& indicesA,
01009         const b3AlignedObjectArray<float4>& verticesB,  const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3GpuFace>& facesB,  const b3AlignedObjectArray<int>& indicesB,
01010 
01011         float4* contactsOut,
01012         int contactCapacity)
01013 {
01014         int numContactsOut = 0;
01015         int numWorldVertsB1= 0;
01016         
01017         B3_PROFILE("clipHullAgainstHull");
01018 
01019 //      float curMaxDist=maxDist;
01020         int closestFaceB=-1;
01021         float dmax = -FLT_MAX;
01022 
01023         {
01024                 //B3_PROFILE("closestFaceB");
01025                 if (hullB.m_numFaces!=1)
01026                 {
01027                         //printf("wtf\n");
01028                 }
01029                 static bool once = true;
01030                 //printf("separatingNormal=%f,%f,%f\n",separatingNormal.x,separatingNormal.y,separatingNormal.z);
01031                 
01032                 for(int face=0;face<hullB.m_numFaces;face++)
01033                 {
01034 #ifdef BT_DEBUG_SAT_FACE
01035                         if (once)
01036                                 printf("face %d\n",face);
01037                         const b3GpuFace* faceB = &facesB[hullB.m_faceOffset+face];
01038                         if (once)
01039                         {
01040                                 for (int i=0;i<faceB->m_numIndices;i++)
01041                                 {
01042                                         float4 vert = verticesB[hullB.m_vertexOffset+indicesB[faceB->m_indexOffset+i]];
01043                                         printf("vert[%d] = %f,%f,%f\n",i,vert.x,vert.y,vert.z);
01044                                 }
01045                         }
01046 #endif //BT_DEBUG_SAT_FACE
01047                         //if (facesB[hullB.m_faceOffset+face].m_numIndices>2)
01048                         {
01049                                 const float4 Normal = b3MakeVector3(facesB[hullB.m_faceOffset+face].m_plane.x, 
01050                                         facesB[hullB.m_faceOffset+face].m_plane.y, facesB[hullB.m_faceOffset+face].m_plane.z,0.f);
01051                                 const float4 WorldNormal = b3QuatRotate(ornB, Normal);
01052 #ifdef BT_DEBUG_SAT_FACE
01053                                 if (once)
01054                                         printf("faceNormal = %f,%f,%f\n",Normal.x,Normal.y,Normal.z);
01055 #endif
01056                                 float d = dot3F4(WorldNormal,separatingNormal);
01057                                 if (d > dmax)
01058                                 {
01059                                         dmax = d;
01060                                         closestFaceB = face;
01061                                 }
01062                         }
01063                 }
01064                 once = false;
01065         }
01066 
01067         
01068         b3Assert(closestFaceB>=0);
01069         {
01070                 //B3_PROFILE("worldVertsB1");
01071                 const b3GpuFace& polyB = facesB[hullB.m_faceOffset+closestFaceB];
01072                 const int numVertices = polyB.m_numIndices;
01073                 for(int e0=0;e0<numVertices;e0++)
01074                 {
01075                         const float4& b = verticesB[hullB.m_vertexOffset+indicesB[polyB.m_indexOffset+e0]];
01076                         worldVertsB1[numWorldVertsB1++] = transform(&b,&posB,&ornB);
01077                 }
01078         }
01079 
01080         if (closestFaceB>=0)
01081         {
01082                 //B3_PROFILE("clipFaceAgainstHull");
01083                 numContactsOut = clipFaceAgainstHull((float4&)separatingNormal, &hullA, 
01084                                 posA,ornA,
01085                                 worldVertsB1,numWorldVertsB1,worldVertsB2,capacityWorldVerts, minDist, maxDist,
01086                                 verticesA,                              facesA,                         indicesA,
01087                                 contactsOut,contactCapacity);
01088         }
01089 
01090         return numContactsOut;
01091 }

01096 
01097 
01098 #define PARALLEL_SUM(v, n) for(int j=1; j<n; j++) v[0] += v[j];
01099 #define PARALLEL_DO(execution, n) for(int ie=0; ie<n; ie++){execution;}
01100 #define REDUCE_MAX(v, n) {int i=0;\
01101 for(int offset=0; offset<n; offset++) v[i] = (v[i].y > v[i+offset].y)? v[i]: v[i+offset]; }
01102 #define REDUCE_MIN(v, n) {int i=0;\
01103 for(int offset=0; offset<n; offset++) v[i] = (v[i].y < v[i+offset].y)? v[i]: v[i+offset]; }
01104 
01105 int extractManifold(const float4* p, int nPoints, const float4& nearNormal, b3Int4* contactIdx)
01106 {
01107         if( nPoints == 0 )
01108         return 0;
01109     
01110     if (nPoints <=4)
01111         return nPoints;
01112     
01113     
01114     if (nPoints >64)
01115         nPoints = 64;
01116     
01117         float4 center = make_float4(0,0,0,0);
01118         {
01119                 
01120                 for (int i=0;i<nPoints;i++)
01121                         center += p[i];
01122                 center /= (float)nPoints;
01123         }
01124     
01125         
01126     
01127         //      sample 4 directions
01128     
01129     float4 aVector = p[0] - center;
01130     float4 u = cross3( nearNormal, aVector );
01131     float4 v = cross3( nearNormal, u );
01132     u = normalize3( u );
01133     v = normalize3( v );
01134     
01135     
01136     //keep point with deepest penetration
01137     float minW= FLT_MAX;
01138     
01139     int minIndex=-1;
01140     
01141     float4 maxDots;
01142     maxDots.x = FLT_MIN;
01143     maxDots.y = FLT_MIN;
01144     maxDots.z = FLT_MIN;
01145     maxDots.w = FLT_MIN;
01146     
01147     //  idx, distance
01148     for(int ie = 0; ie<nPoints; ie++ )
01149     {
01150         if (p[ie].w<minW)
01151         {
01152             minW = p[ie].w;
01153             minIndex=ie;
01154         }
01155         float f;
01156         float4 r = p[ie]-center;
01157         f = dot3F4( u, r );
01158         if (f<maxDots.x)
01159         {
01160             maxDots.x = f;
01161             contactIdx[0].x = ie;
01162         }
01163         
01164         f = dot3F4( -u, r );
01165         if (f<maxDots.y)
01166         {
01167             maxDots.y = f;
01168             contactIdx[0].y = ie;
01169         }
01170         
01171         
01172         f = dot3F4( v, r );
01173         if (f<maxDots.z)
01174         {
01175             maxDots.z = f;
01176             contactIdx[0].z = ie;
01177         }
01178         
01179         f = dot3F4( -v, r );
01180         if (f<maxDots.w)
01181         {
01182             maxDots.w = f;
01183             contactIdx[0].w = ie;
01184         }
01185         
01186     }
01187     
01188     if (contactIdx[0].x != minIndex && contactIdx[0].y != minIndex && contactIdx[0].z != minIndex && contactIdx[0].w != minIndex)
01189     {
01190         //replace the first contact with minimum (todo: replace contact with least penetration)
01191         contactIdx[0].x = minIndex;
01192     }
01193     
01194     return 4;
01195     
01196 }
01197 
01198 
01199 
01200 
01201 int clipHullHullSingle(
01202                         int bodyIndexA, int bodyIndexB,
01203                                                                                  const float4& posA,
01204                                                                                  const b3Quaternion& ornA,
01205                                                                                  const float4& posB,
01206                                                                                  const b3Quaternion& ornB,
01207 
01208                         int collidableIndexA, int collidableIndexB,
01209 
01210                         const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3RigidBodyData>* bodyBuf, 
01211                         b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Contact4>* globalContactOut, 
01212                         int& nContacts,
01213                         
01214                         const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3ConvexPolyhedronData>& hostConvexDataA,
01215                         const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3ConvexPolyhedronData>& hostConvexDataB,
01216         
01217                         const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Vector3>& verticesA, 
01218                         const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Vector3>& uniqueEdgesA, 
01219                         const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3GpuFace>& facesA,
01220                         const b3AlignedObjectArray<int>& indicesA,
01221         
01222                         const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Vector3>& verticesB,
01223                         const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Vector3>& uniqueEdgesB,
01224                         const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3GpuFace>& facesB,
01225                         const b3AlignedObjectArray<int>& indicesB,
01226 
01227                         const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Collidable>& hostCollidablesA,
01228                         const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Collidable>& hostCollidablesB,
01229                         const b3Vector3& sepNormalWorldSpace,
01230                         int maxContactCapacity                  )
01231 {
01232         int contactIndex = -1;
01233         b3ConvexPolyhedronData hullA, hullB;
01234     
01235     b3Collidable colA = hostCollidablesA[collidableIndexA];
01236     hullA = hostConvexDataA[colA.m_shapeIndex];
01237     //printf("numvertsA = %d\n",hullA.m_numVertices);
01238     
01239     
01240     b3Collidable colB = hostCollidablesB[collidableIndexB];
01241     hullB = hostConvexDataB[colB.m_shapeIndex];
01242     //printf("numvertsB = %d\n",hullB.m_numVertices);
01243     
01244         
01245         float4 contactsOut[MAX_VERTS];
01246         int localContactCapacity = MAX_VERTS;
01247 
01248 #ifdef _WIN32
01249         b3Assert(_finite(bodyBuf->at(bodyIndexA).m_pos.x));
01250         b3Assert(_finite(bodyBuf->at(bodyIndexB).m_pos.x));
01251 #endif
01252         
01253         
01254         {
01255                 
01256                 float4 worldVertsB1[MAX_VERTS];
01257                 float4 worldVertsB2[MAX_VERTS];
01258                 int capacityWorldVerts = MAX_VERTS;
01259 
01260                 float4 hostNormal = make_float4(sepNormalWorldSpace.x,sepNormalWorldSpace.y,sepNormalWorldSpace.z,0.f);
01261                 int shapeA = hostCollidablesA[collidableIndexA].m_shapeIndex;
01262                 int shapeB = hostCollidablesB[collidableIndexB].m_shapeIndex;
01263 
01264                 b3Scalar minDist = -1;
01265                 b3Scalar maxDist = 0.;
01266 
01267                         
01268 
01269                 b3Transform trA,trB;
01270                 {
01271                 //B3_PROFILE("transform computation");
01272                 //trA.setIdentity();
01273                 trA.setOrigin(b3MakeVector3(posA.x,posA.y,posA.z));
01274                 trA.setRotation(b3Quaternion(ornA.x,ornA.y,ornA.z,ornA.w));
01275                                 
01276                 //trB.setIdentity();
01277                 trB.setOrigin(b3MakeVector3(posB.x,posB.y,posB.z));
01278                 trB.setRotation(b3Quaternion(ornB.x,ornB.y,ornB.z,ornB.w));
01279                 }
01280 
01281                 b3Quaternion trAorn = trA.getRotation();
01282         b3Quaternion trBorn = trB.getRotation();
01283         
01284                 int numContactsOut = clipHullAgainstHull(hostNormal, 
01285                                                 hostConvexDataA.at(shapeA), 
01286                                                 hostConvexDataB.at(shapeB),
01287                                                                 (float4&)trA.getOrigin(), (b3Quaternion&)trAorn,
01288                                                                 (float4&)trB.getOrigin(), (b3Quaternion&)trBorn,
01289                                                                 worldVertsB1,worldVertsB2,capacityWorldVerts,
01290                                                                 minDist, maxDist,
01291                                                                 verticesA,      facesA,indicesA,
01292                                                                 verticesB,      facesB,indicesB,
01293                                                                 
01294                                                                 contactsOut,localContactCapacity);
01295 
01296                 if (numContactsOut>0)
01297                 {
01298                         B3_PROFILE("overlap");
01299 
01300                         float4 normalOnSurfaceB = (float4&)hostNormal;
01301                         
01302                         b3Int4 contactIdx;
01303                         contactIdx.x = 0;
01304                         contactIdx.y = 1;
01305                         contactIdx.z = 2;
01306                         contactIdx.w = 3;
01307                         
01308                         int numPoints = 0;
01309                                         
01310                         {
01311                         //      B3_PROFILE("extractManifold");
01312                                 numPoints = extractManifold(contactsOut, numContactsOut, normalOnSurfaceB,  &contactIdx);
01313                         }
01314                                         
01315                         b3Assert(numPoints);
01316                                         
01317                         if (nContacts<maxContactCapacity)
01318                         {
01319                                 contactIndex = nContacts;
01320                                 globalContactOut->expand();
01321                                 b3Contact4& contact = globalContactOut->at(nContacts);
01322                                 contact.m_batchIdx = 0;//i;
01323                                 contact.m_bodyAPtrAndSignBit = (bodyBuf->at(bodyIndexA).m_invMass==0)? -bodyIndexA:bodyIndexA;
01324                                 contact.m_bodyBPtrAndSignBit = (bodyBuf->at(bodyIndexB).m_invMass==0)? -bodyIndexB:bodyIndexB;
01325 
01326                                 contact.m_frictionCoeffCmp = 45874;
01327                                 contact.m_restituitionCoeffCmp = 0;
01328                                         
01329         //                      float distance = 0.f;
01330                                 for (int p=0;p<numPoints;p++)
01331                                 {
01332                                         contact.m_worldPosB[p] = contactsOut[contactIdx.s[p]];//check if it is actually on B
01333                                         contact.m_worldNormalOnB = normalOnSurfaceB; 
01334                                 }
01335                                 //printf("bodyIndexA %d,bodyIndexB %d,normal=%f,%f,%f numPoints %d\n",bodyIndexA,bodyIndexB,normalOnSurfaceB.x,normalOnSurfaceB.y,normalOnSurfaceB.z,numPoints);
01336                                 contact.m_worldNormalOnB.w = (b3Scalar)numPoints;
01337                                 nContacts++;
01338                         } else
01339                         {
01340                                 b3Error("Error: exceeding contact capacity (%d/%d)\n", nContacts,maxContactCapacity);
01341                         }
01342                 }
01343         }
01344         return contactIndex;
01345 }
01346 
01347         
01348 
01349 
01350 
01351 void computeContactPlaneConvex(int pairIndex,
01352                                                                                                                                 int bodyIndexA, int bodyIndexB, 
01353                                                                                                                                 int collidableIndexA, int collidableIndexB, 
01354                                                                                                                                 const b3RigidBodyData* rigidBodies, 
01355                                                                                                                                 const b3Collidable* collidables,
01356                                                                                                                                 const b3ConvexPolyhedronData* convexShapes,
01357                                                                                                                                 const b3Vector3* convexVertices,
01358                                                                                                                                 const int* convexIndices,
01359                                                                                                                                 const b3GpuFace* faces,
01360                                                                                                                                 b3Contact4* globalContactsOut,
01361                                                                                                                                 int& nGlobalContactsOut,
01362                                                                                                                                 int maxContactCapacity)
01363 {
01364 
01365                 int shapeIndex = collidables[collidableIndexB].m_shapeIndex;
01366         const b3ConvexPolyhedronData* hullB = &convexShapes[shapeIndex];
01367         
01368         b3Vector3 posB = rigidBodies[bodyIndexB].m_pos;
01369         b3Quaternion ornB = rigidBodies[bodyIndexB].m_quat;
01370         b3Vector3 posA = rigidBodies[bodyIndexA].m_pos;
01371         b3Quaternion ornA = rigidBodies[bodyIndexA].m_quat;
01372 
01373 //      int numContactsOut = 0;
01374 //      int numWorldVertsB1= 0;
01375 
01376         b3Vector3 planeEq = faces[collidables[collidableIndexA].m_shapeIndex].m_plane;
01377         b3Vector3 planeNormal=b3MakeVector3(planeEq.x,planeEq.y,planeEq.z);
01378         b3Vector3 planeNormalWorld = b3QuatRotate(ornA,planeNormal);
01379         float planeConstant = planeEq.w;
01380         b3Transform convexWorldTransform;
01381         convexWorldTransform.setIdentity();
01382         convexWorldTransform.setOrigin(posB);
01383         convexWorldTransform.setRotation(ornB);
01384         b3Transform planeTransform;
01385         planeTransform.setIdentity();
01386         planeTransform.setOrigin(posA);
01387         planeTransform.setRotation(ornA);
01388 
01389         b3Transform planeInConvex;
01390         planeInConvex= convexWorldTransform.inverse() * planeTransform;
01391         b3Transform convexInPlane;
01392         convexInPlane = planeTransform.inverse() * convexWorldTransform;
01393         
01394         b3Vector3 planeNormalInConvex = planeInConvex.getBasis()*-planeNormal;
01395         float maxDot = -1e30;
01396         int hitVertex=-1;
01397         b3Vector3 hitVtx;
01398 
01399 #define MAX_PLANE_CONVEX_POINTS 64
01400 
01401         b3Vector3 contactPoints[MAX_PLANE_CONVEX_POINTS];
01402         int numPoints = 0;
01403 
01404         b3Int4 contactIdx;
01405         contactIdx.s[0] = 0;
01406         contactIdx.s[1] = 1;
01407         contactIdx.s[2] = 2;
01408         contactIdx.s[3] = 3;
01409         
01410         for (int i=0;i<hullB->m_numVertices;i++)
01411         {
01412                 b3Vector3 vtx = convexVertices[hullB->m_vertexOffset+i];
01413                 float curDot = vtx.dot(planeNormalInConvex);
01414 
01415 
01416                 if (curDot>maxDot)
01417                 {
01418                         hitVertex=i;
01419                         maxDot=curDot;
01420                         hitVtx = vtx;
01421                         //make sure the deepest points is always included
01422                         if (numPoints==MAX_PLANE_CONVEX_POINTS)
01423                                 numPoints--;
01424                 }
01425 
01426                 if (numPoints<MAX_PLANE_CONVEX_POINTS)
01427                 {
01428                         b3Vector3 vtxWorld = convexWorldTransform*vtx;
01429                         b3Vector3 vtxInPlane = planeTransform.inverse()*vtxWorld;
01430                         float dist = planeNormal.dot(vtxInPlane)-planeConstant;
01431                         if (dist<0.f)
01432                         {
01433                                 vtxWorld.w = dist;
01434                                 contactPoints[numPoints] = vtxWorld;
01435                                 numPoints++;
01436                         }
01437                 }
01438 
01439         }
01440 
01441         int numReducedPoints  = 0;
01442 
01443         numReducedPoints = numPoints;
01444         
01445         if (numPoints>4)
01446         {
01447                 numReducedPoints = extractManifoldSequentialGlobal( contactPoints, numPoints, planeNormalInConvex, &contactIdx);
01448         }
01449         int dstIdx;
01450 //    dstIdx = nGlobalContactsOut++;//AppendInc( nGlobalContactsOut, dstIdx );
01451                 
01452         if (numReducedPoints>0)
01453         {
01454                 if (nGlobalContactsOut < maxContactCapacity)
01455                 {
01456                         dstIdx=nGlobalContactsOut;
01457                         nGlobalContactsOut++;
01458 
01459                         b3Contact4* c = &globalContactsOut[dstIdx];
01460                         c->m_worldNormalOnB = -planeNormalWorld;
01461                         c->setFrictionCoeff(0.7);
01462                         c->setRestituitionCoeff(0.f);
01463 
01464                         c->m_batchIdx = pairIndex;
01465                         c->m_bodyAPtrAndSignBit = rigidBodies[bodyIndexA].m_invMass==0?-bodyIndexA:bodyIndexA;
01466                         c->m_bodyBPtrAndSignBit = rigidBodies[bodyIndexB].m_invMass==0?-bodyIndexB:bodyIndexB;
01467                         for (int i=0;i<numReducedPoints;i++)
01468                         {
01469                                 b3Vector3 pOnB1 = contactPoints[contactIdx.s[i]];
01470                                 c->m_worldPosB[i] = pOnB1;
01471                         }
01472                         c->m_worldNormalOnB.w = (b3Scalar)numReducedPoints;
01473                 }//if (dstIdx < numPairs)
01474         }       
01475                 
01476 
01477 
01478 //      printf("computeContactPlaneConvex\n");
01479 }
01480

01482 
01483 B3_FORCE_INLINE b3Vector3       MyUnQuantize(const unsigned short* vecIn, const b3Vector3& quantization, const b3Vector3& bvhAabbMin)
01484         {
01485                         b3Vector3       vecOut;
01486                         vecOut.setValue(
01487                         (b3Scalar)(vecIn[0]) / (quantization.x),
01488                         (b3Scalar)(vecIn[1]) / (quantization.y),
01489                         (b3Scalar)(vecIn[2]) / (quantization.z));
01490                         vecOut += bvhAabbMin;
01491                         return vecOut;
01492         }
01493 
01494 void traverseTreeTree()
01495 {
01496 
01497 }
01498 
01499 #include "Bullet3Common/shared/b3Mat3x3.h"
01500 
01501 int numAabbChecks = 0;
01502 int maxNumAabbChecks = 0;
01503 int maxDepth = 0;
01504 
01505 // work-in-progress
01506 __kernel void   findCompoundPairsKernel( 
01507         int pairIndex,
01508         int bodyIndexA,
01509         int bodyIndexB,
01510         int collidableIndexA,
01511         int collidableIndexB,
01512         __global const b3RigidBodyData* rigidBodies, 
01513         __global const b3Collidable* collidables,
01514         __global const b3ConvexPolyhedronData* convexShapes, 
01515         __global const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Float4>& vertices,
01516         __global const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Aabb>& aabbsWorldSpace,
01517         __global const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Aabb>& aabbsLocalSpace,
01518         __global const b3GpuChildShape* gpuChildShapes,
01519         __global b3Int4* gpuCompoundPairsOut,
01520         __global  int* numCompoundPairsOut,
01521         int maxNumCompoundPairsCapacity,
01522         b3AlignedObjectArray<b3QuantizedBvhNode>&       treeNodesCPU,
01523         b3AlignedObjectArray<b3BvhSubtreeInfo>& subTreesCPU,
01524         b3AlignedObjectArray<b3BvhInfo>&        bvhInfoCPU
01525         )
01526 {
01527         numAabbChecks=0;
01528         maxNumAabbChecks=0;
01529 //      int i = pairIndex;
01530         {
01531                 
01532 
01533                 int shapeIndexA = collidables[collidableIndexA].m_shapeIndex;
01534                 int shapeIndexB = collidables[collidableIndexB].m_shapeIndex;
01535 
01536 
01537                 //once the broadphase avoids static-static pairs, we can remove this test
01538                 if ((rigidBodies[bodyIndexA].m_invMass==0) &&(rigidBodies[bodyIndexB].m_invMass==0))
01539                 {
01540                         return;
01541                 }
01542 
01543                 if ((collidables[collidableIndexA].m_shapeType==SHAPE_COMPOUND_OF_CONVEX_HULLS) &&(collidables[collidableIndexB].m_shapeType==SHAPE_COMPOUND_OF_CONVEX_HULLS))
01544                 {
01545                         int bvhA = collidables[collidableIndexA].m_compoundBvhIndex;
01546                         int bvhB = collidables[collidableIndexB].m_compoundBvhIndex;
01547                         int numSubTreesA = bvhInfoCPU[bvhA].m_numSubTrees;
01548                         int subTreesOffsetA = bvhInfoCPU[bvhA].m_subTreeOffset;
01549                         int subTreesOffsetB = bvhInfoCPU[bvhB].m_subTreeOffset;
01550 
01551 
01552                         int numSubTreesB = bvhInfoCPU[bvhB].m_numSubTrees;
01553                         
01554                         float4 posA = rigidBodies[bodyIndexA].m_pos;
01555                         b3Quat ornA = rigidBodies[bodyIndexA].m_quat;
01556 
01557                         b3Transform transA;
01558                         transA.setIdentity();
01559                         transA.setOrigin(posA);
01560                         transA.setRotation(ornA);
01561 
01562                         b3Quat ornB = rigidBodies[bodyIndexB].m_quat;
01563                         float4 posB = rigidBodies[bodyIndexB].m_pos;
01564 
01565                         b3Transform transB;
01566                         transB.setIdentity();
01567                         transB.setOrigin(posB);
01568                         transB.setRotation(ornB);
01569 
01570 
01571 
01572                         for (int p=0;p<numSubTreesA;p++)
01573                         {
01574                                 b3BvhSubtreeInfo subtreeA = subTreesCPU[subTreesOffsetA+p];
01575                                 //bvhInfoCPU[bvhA].m_quantization
01576                                 b3Vector3 treeAminLocal = MyUnQuantize(subtreeA.m_quantizedAabbMin,bvhInfoCPU[bvhA].m_quantization,bvhInfoCPU[bvhA].m_aabbMin);
01577                                 b3Vector3 treeAmaxLocal = MyUnQuantize(subtreeA.m_quantizedAabbMax,bvhInfoCPU[bvhA].m_quantization,bvhInfoCPU[bvhA].m_aabbMin);
01578 
01579                                 b3Vector3 aabbAMinOut,aabbAMaxOut;
01580                                 float margin=0.f;
01581                                 b3TransformAabb2(treeAminLocal,treeAmaxLocal, margin,transA.getOrigin(),transA.getRotation(),&aabbAMinOut,&aabbAMaxOut);
01582 
01583                                 for (int q=0;q<numSubTreesB;q++)
01584                                 {
01585                                         b3BvhSubtreeInfo subtreeB = subTreesCPU[subTreesOffsetB+q];
01586 
01587                                         b3Vector3 treeBminLocal = MyUnQuantize(subtreeB.m_quantizedAabbMin,bvhInfoCPU[bvhB].m_quantization,bvhInfoCPU[bvhB].m_aabbMin);
01588                                         b3Vector3 treeBmaxLocal = MyUnQuantize(subtreeB.m_quantizedAabbMax,bvhInfoCPU[bvhB].m_quantization,bvhInfoCPU[bvhB].m_aabbMin);
01589 
01590                                         b3Vector3 aabbBMinOut,aabbBMaxOut;
01591                                         float margin=0.f;
01592                                         b3TransformAabb2(treeBminLocal,treeBmaxLocal, margin,transB.getOrigin(),transB.getRotation(),&aabbBMinOut,&aabbBMaxOut);
01593 
01594                                         
01595                                         numAabbChecks=0;
01596                                         bool aabbOverlap = b3TestAabbAgainstAabb(aabbAMinOut,aabbAMaxOut,aabbBMinOut,aabbBMaxOut);
01597                                         if (aabbOverlap)
01598                                         {
01599                                                 
01600                                                 int startNodeIndexA = subtreeA.m_rootNodeIndex+bvhInfoCPU[bvhA].m_nodeOffset;
01601                 //                              int endNodeIndexA = startNodeIndexA+subtreeA.m_subtreeSize;
01602 
01603                                                 int startNodeIndexB = subtreeB.m_rootNodeIndex+bvhInfoCPU[bvhB].m_nodeOffset;
01604                 //                              int endNodeIndexB = startNodeIndexB+subtreeB.m_subtreeSize;
01605 
01606                                                 b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Int2> nodeStack;
01607                                                 b3Int2 node0;
01608                                                 node0.x = startNodeIndexA;
01609                                                 node0.y = startNodeIndexB;
01610 
01611                                                 int maxStackDepth = 1024;
01612                                                 nodeStack.resize(maxStackDepth);
01613                                                 int depth=0;
01614                                                 nodeStack[depth++]=node0;
01615 
01616                                                 do
01617                                                 {
01618                                                         if (depth > maxDepth)
01619                                                         {
01620                                                                 maxDepth=depth;
01621                                                                 printf("maxDepth=%d\n",maxDepth);
01622                                                         }
01623                                                         b3Int2 node = nodeStack[--depth];
01624                                                         
01625                                                         b3Vector3 aMinLocal = MyUnQuantize(treeNodesCPU[node.x].m_quantizedAabbMin,bvhInfoCPU[bvhA].m_quantization,bvhInfoCPU[bvhA].m_aabbMin);
01626                                                         b3Vector3 aMaxLocal = MyUnQuantize(treeNodesCPU[node.x].m_quantizedAabbMax,bvhInfoCPU[bvhA].m_quantization,bvhInfoCPU[bvhA].m_aabbMin);
01627 
01628                                                         b3Vector3 bMinLocal = MyUnQuantize(treeNodesCPU[node.y].m_quantizedAabbMin,bvhInfoCPU[bvhB].m_quantization,bvhInfoCPU[bvhB].m_aabbMin);
01629                                                         b3Vector3 bMaxLocal = MyUnQuantize(treeNodesCPU[node.y].m_quantizedAabbMax,bvhInfoCPU[bvhB].m_quantization,bvhInfoCPU[bvhB].m_aabbMin);
01630 
01631                                                         float margin=0.f;
01632                                                         b3Vector3 aabbAMinOut,aabbAMaxOut;
01633                                                         b3TransformAabb2(aMinLocal,aMaxLocal, margin,transA.getOrigin(),transA.getRotation(),&aabbAMinOut,&aabbAMaxOut);
01634 
01635                                                         b3Vector3 aabbBMinOut,aabbBMaxOut;
01636                                                         b3TransformAabb2(bMinLocal,bMaxLocal, margin,transB.getOrigin(),transB.getRotation(),&aabbBMinOut,&aabbBMaxOut);
01637 
01638                                                         numAabbChecks++;
01639                                                         bool nodeOverlap = b3TestAabbAgainstAabb(aabbAMinOut,aabbAMaxOut,aabbBMinOut,aabbBMaxOut);
01640                                                         if (nodeOverlap)
01641                                                         {
01642                                                                 bool isLeafA = treeNodesCPU[node.x].isLeafNode();
01643                                                                 bool isLeafB = treeNodesCPU[node.y].isLeafNode();
01644                                                                 bool isInternalA = !isLeafA;
01645                                                                 bool isInternalB = !isLeafB;
01646 
01647                                                                 //fail, even though it might hit two leaf nodes
01648                                                                 if (depth+4>maxStackDepth && !(isLeafA && isLeafB))
01649                                                                 {
01650                                                                         b3Error("Error: traversal exceeded maxStackDepth\n");
01651                                                                         continue;
01652                                                                 }
01653 
01654                                                                 if(isInternalA)
01655                                                                 {
01656                                                                         int nodeAleftChild = node.x+1;
01657                                                                         bool isNodeALeftChildLeaf = treeNodesCPU[node.x+1].isLeafNode();
01658                                                                         int nodeArightChild = isNodeALeftChildLeaf? node.x+2 : node.x+1 + treeNodesCPU[node.x+1].getEscapeIndex();
01659 
01660                                                                         if(isInternalB)
01661                                                                         {                                       
01662                                                                                 int nodeBleftChild = node.y+1;
01663                                                                                 bool isNodeBLeftChildLeaf = treeNodesCPU[node.y+1].isLeafNode();
01664                                                                                 int nodeBrightChild = isNodeBLeftChildLeaf? node.y+2 : node.y+1 + treeNodesCPU[node.y+1].getEscapeIndex();
01665 
01666                                                                                 nodeStack[depth++] = b3MakeInt2(nodeAleftChild, nodeBleftChild);
01667                                                                                 nodeStack[depth++] = b3MakeInt2(nodeArightChild, nodeBleftChild);
01668                                                                                 nodeStack[depth++] = b3MakeInt2(nodeAleftChild, nodeBrightChild);
01669                                                                                 nodeStack[depth++] = b3MakeInt2(nodeArightChild, nodeBrightChild);
01670                                                                         }
01671                                                                         else
01672                                                                         {
01673                                                                                 nodeStack[depth++] = b3MakeInt2(nodeAleftChild,node.y);
01674                                                                                 nodeStack[depth++] = b3MakeInt2(nodeArightChild,node.y);
01675                                                                         }
01676                                                                 }
01677                                                                 else
01678                                                                 {
01679                                                                         if(isInternalB)
01680                                                                         {
01681                                                                                 int nodeBleftChild = node.y+1;
01682                                                                                 bool isNodeBLeftChildLeaf = treeNodesCPU[node.y+1].isLeafNode();
01683                                                                                 int nodeBrightChild = isNodeBLeftChildLeaf? node.y+2 : node.y+1 + treeNodesCPU[node.y+1].getEscapeIndex();
01684                                                                                 nodeStack[depth++] = b3MakeInt2(node.x,nodeBleftChild);
01685                                                                                 nodeStack[depth++] = b3MakeInt2(node.x,nodeBrightChild);
01686                                                                         }
01687                                                                         else
01688                                                                         {
01689                                                                                 int compoundPairIdx = b3AtomicInc(numCompoundPairsOut);
01690                                                                                 if (compoundPairIdx<maxNumCompoundPairsCapacity)
01691                                                                                 {
01692                                                                                         int childShapeIndexA = treeNodesCPU[node.x].getTriangleIndex();
01693                                                                                         int childShapeIndexB = treeNodesCPU[node.y].getTriangleIndex();
01694                                                                                         gpuCompoundPairsOut[compoundPairIdx]  = b3MakeInt4(bodyIndexA,bodyIndexB,childShapeIndexA,childShapeIndexB);
01695                                                                                 }
01696                                                                         }
01697                                                                 }
01698                                                         }
01699                                                 } while (depth);
01700                                                 maxNumAabbChecks = b3Max(numAabbChecks,maxNumAabbChecks);
01701                                         }
01702                                 }
01703                         }
01704                         
01705                         return;
01706                 }
01707 
01708                 if ((collidables[collidableIndexA].m_shapeType==SHAPE_COMPOUND_OF_CONVEX_HULLS) ||(collidables[collidableIndexB].m_shapeType==SHAPE_COMPOUND_OF_CONVEX_HULLS))
01709                 {
01710 
01711                         if (collidables[collidableIndexA].m_shapeType==SHAPE_COMPOUND_OF_CONVEX_HULLS) 
01712                         {
01713 
01714                                 int numChildrenA = collidables[collidableIndexA].m_numChildShapes;
01715                                 for (int c=0;c<numChildrenA;c++)
01716                                 {
01717                                         int childShapeIndexA = collidables[collidableIndexA].m_shapeIndex+c;
01718                                         int childColIndexA = gpuChildShapes[childShapeIndexA].m_shapeIndex;
01719 
01720                                         float4 posA = rigidBodies[bodyIndexA].m_pos;
01721                                         b3Quat ornA = rigidBodies[bodyIndexA].m_quat;
01722                                         float4 childPosA = gpuChildShapes[childShapeIndexA].m_childPosition;
01723                                         b3Quat childOrnA = gpuChildShapes[childShapeIndexA].m_childOrientation;
01724                                         float4 newPosA = b3QuatRotate(ornA,childPosA)+posA;
01725                                         b3Quat newOrnA = b3QuatMul(ornA,childOrnA);
01726                                         
01727 
01728                                         
01729                                         b3Aabb aabbA = aabbsLocalSpace[childColIndexA];
01730 
01731                                         
01732                                         b3Transform transA;
01733                                         transA.setIdentity();
01734                                         transA.setOrigin(newPosA);
01735                                         transA.setRotation(newOrnA);
01736                                         b3Scalar margin=0.0f;
01737 
01738                                         b3Vector3 aabbAMinOut,aabbAMaxOut;
01739 
01740                                         b3TransformAabb2((const b3Float4&)aabbA.m_min,(const b3Float4&)aabbA.m_max, margin,transA.getOrigin(),transA.getRotation(),&aabbAMinOut,&aabbAMaxOut);
01741 
01742                                         if (collidables[collidableIndexB].m_shapeType==SHAPE_COMPOUND_OF_CONVEX_HULLS)
01743                                         {
01744                                                 int numChildrenB = collidables[collidableIndexB].m_numChildShapes;
01745                                                 for (int b=0;b<numChildrenB;b++)
01746                                                 {
01747                                                         int childShapeIndexB = collidables[collidableIndexB].m_shapeIndex+b;
01748                                                         int childColIndexB = gpuChildShapes[childShapeIndexB].m_shapeIndex;
01749                                                         b3Quat ornB = rigidBodies[bodyIndexB].m_quat;
01750                                                         float4 posB = rigidBodies[bodyIndexB].m_pos;
01751                                                         float4 childPosB = gpuChildShapes[childShapeIndexB].m_childPosition;
01752                                                         b3Quat childOrnB = gpuChildShapes[childShapeIndexB].m_childOrientation;
01753                                                         float4 newPosB = transform(&childPosB,&posB,&ornB);
01754                                                         b3Quat newOrnB = b3QuatMul(ornB,childOrnB);
01755 
01756                                                         
01757 
01758                                                         b3Aabb aabbB = aabbsLocalSpace[childColIndexB];
01759 
01760                                                         b3Transform transB;
01761                                                         transB.setIdentity();
01762                                                         transB.setOrigin(newPosB);
01763                                                         transB.setRotation(newOrnB);
01764 
01765                                                         b3Vector3 aabbBMinOut,aabbBMaxOut;
01766                                                         b3TransformAabb2((const b3Float4&)aabbB.m_min,(const b3Float4&)aabbB.m_max, margin,transB.getOrigin(),transB.getRotation(),&aabbBMinOut,&aabbBMaxOut);
01767 
01768                                                         numAabbChecks++;
01769                                                         bool aabbOverlap = b3TestAabbAgainstAabb(aabbAMinOut,aabbAMaxOut,aabbBMinOut,aabbBMaxOut);
01770                                                         if (aabbOverlap)
01771                                                         {
01772                                                                 /*
01773                                                                 int numFacesA = convexShapes[shapeIndexA].m_numFaces;
01774                                                                 float dmin = FLT_MAX;
01775                                                                 float4 posA = newPosA;
01776                                                                 posA.w = 0.f;
01777                                                                 float4 posB = newPosB;
01778                                                                 posB.w = 0.f;
01779                                                                 float4 c0local = convexShapes[shapeIndexA].m_localCenter;
01780                                                                 b3Quat ornA = newOrnA;
01781                                                                 float4 c0 = transform(&c0local, &posA, &ornA);
01782                                                                 float4 c1local = convexShapes[shapeIndexB].m_localCenter;
01783                                                                 b3Quat ornB =newOrnB;
01784                                                                 float4 c1 = transform(&c1local,&posB,&ornB);
01785                                                                 const float4 DeltaC2 = c0 - c1;
01786                                                                 */
01787                                                                 {//
01788                                                                         int compoundPairIdx = b3AtomicInc(numCompoundPairsOut);
01789                                                                         if (compoundPairIdx<maxNumCompoundPairsCapacity)
01790                                                                         {
01791                                                                                 gpuCompoundPairsOut[compoundPairIdx]  = b3MakeInt4(bodyIndexA,bodyIndexB,childShapeIndexA,childShapeIndexB);
01792                                                                         }
01793                                                                 }//
01794                                                         }//fi(1)
01795                                                 } //for (int b=0
01796                                         }//if (collidables[collidableIndexB].
01797                                         else//if (collidables[collidableIndexB].m_shapeType==SHAPE_COMPOUND_OF_CONVEX_HULLS)
01798                                         {
01799                                                 if (1)
01800                                                 {
01801                                                 //      int numFacesA = convexShapes[shapeIndexA].m_numFaces;
01802                                                 //      float dmin = FLT_MAX;
01803                                                         float4 posA = newPosA;
01804                                                         posA.w = 0.f;
01805                                                         float4 posB = rigidBodies[bodyIndexB].m_pos;
01806                                                         posB.w = 0.f;
01807                                                         float4 c0local = convexShapes[shapeIndexA].m_localCenter;
01808                                                         b3Quat ornA = newOrnA;
01809                                                         float4 c0;
01810                                                         c0 = transform(&c0local, &posA, &ornA);
01811                                                         float4 c1local = convexShapes[shapeIndexB].m_localCenter;
01812                                                         b3Quat ornB = rigidBodies[bodyIndexB].m_quat;
01813                                                         float4 c1;
01814                                                         c1 = transform(&c1local,&posB,&ornB);
01815                                                 //      const float4 DeltaC2 = c0 - c1;
01816 
01817                                                         {
01818                                                                 int compoundPairIdx = b3AtomicInc(numCompoundPairsOut);
01819                                                                 if (compoundPairIdx<maxNumCompoundPairsCapacity)
01820                                                                 {
01821                                                                         gpuCompoundPairsOut[compoundPairIdx] = b3MakeInt4(bodyIndexA,bodyIndexB,childShapeIndexA,-1);
01822                                                                 }//if (compoundPairIdx<maxNumCompoundPairsCapacity)
01823                                                         }//
01824                                                 }//fi (1)
01825                                         }//if (collidables[collidableIndexB].m_shapeType==SHAPE_COMPOUND_OF_CONVEX_HULLS)
01826                                 }//for (int b=0;b<numChildrenB;b++)     
01827                                 return;
01828                         }//if (collidables[collidableIndexB].m_shapeType==SHAPE_COMPOUND_OF_CONVEX_HULLS)
01829                         if ((collidables[collidableIndexA].m_shapeType!=SHAPE_CONCAVE_TRIMESH) 
01830                                 && (collidables[collidableIndexB].m_shapeType==SHAPE_COMPOUND_OF_CONVEX_HULLS))
01831                         {

01833                                 for (int b=0;b<numChildrenB;b++)

01836                                         int childColIndexB = gpuChildShapes[childShapeIndexB].m_shapeIndex;
