01838                                         float4 posB = rigidBodies[bodyIndexB].m_pos;
01839                                         float4 childPosB = gpuChildShapes[childShapeIndexB].m_childPosition;
01840                                         b3Quat childOrnB = gpuChildShapes[childShapeIndexB].m_childOrientation;
01841                                         float4 newPosB = b3QuatRotate(ornB,childPosB)+posB;
01842                                         b3Quat newOrnB = b3QuatMul(ornB,childOrnB);
01843 
01844                                         int shapeIndexB = collidables[childColIndexB].m_shapeIndex;
01845 
01846 
01848 
01849                                         if (1)
01850                                         {
01851                                         //      int numFacesA = convexShapes[shapeIndexA].m_numFaces;
01852                                         //      float dmin = FLT_MAX;
01853                                                 float4 posA = rigidBodies[bodyIndexA].m_pos;
01854                                                 posA.w = 0.f;
01855                                                 float4 posB = newPosB;
01856                                                 posB.w = 0.f;
01857                                                 float4 c0local = convexShapes[shapeIndexA].m_localCenter;
01858                                                 b3Quat ornA = rigidBodies[bodyIndexA].m_quat;
01859                                                 float4 c0;
01860                                                 c0 = transform(&c0local, &posA, &ornA);
01861                                                 float4 c1local = convexShapes[shapeIndexB].m_localCenter;
01862                                                 b3Quat ornB =newOrnB;
01863                                                 float4 c1;
01864                                                 c1 = transform(&c1local,&posB,&ornB);
01865                                         //      const float4 DeltaC2 = c0 - c1;
01866                                                 {//
01867                                                         int compoundPairIdx = b3AtomicInc(numCompoundPairsOut);
01868                                                         if (compoundPairIdx<maxNumCompoundPairsCapacity)
01869                                                         {
01870                                                                 gpuCompoundPairsOut[compoundPairIdx] = b3MakeInt4(bodyIndexA,bodyIndexB,-1,childShapeIndexB);
01871                                                         }//fi (compoundPairIdx<maxNumCompoundPairsCapacity)
01872                                                 }//
01873                                         }//fi (1)       
01874                                 }//for (int b=0;b<numChildrenB;b++)
01875                                 return;
01876                         }//if (collidables[collidableIndexB].m_shapeType==SHAPE_COMPOUND_OF_CONVEX_HULLS)
01877                         return;
01878                 }//fi ((collidables[collidableIndexA].m_shapeType==SHAPE_COMPOUND_OF_CONVEX_HULLS) ||(collidables[collidableIndexB].m_shapeType==SHAPE_COMPOUND_OF_CONVEX_HULLS))
01879         }//i<numPairs
01880 }

01883 
01884 __kernel void   processCompoundPairsKernel( __global const b3Int4* gpuCompoundPairs,
01885                                                                                 __global const b3RigidBodyData* rigidBodies, 
01886                                                                                 __global const b3Collidable* collidables,
01887                                                                                 __global const b3ConvexPolyhedronData* convexShapes, 
01888                                                                                 __global const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Float4>& vertices,
01889                                                                                 __global const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Float4>& uniqueEdges,
01890                                                                                 __global const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3GpuFace>& faces,
01891                                                                                 __global const b3AlignedObjectArray<int>& indices,
01892                                                                                 __global b3Aabb* aabbs,
01893                                                                                 __global const b3GpuChildShape* gpuChildShapes,
01894                                                                                 __global b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Float4>& gpuCompoundSepNormalsOut,
01895                                                                                 __global b3AlignedObjectArray<int>& gpuHasCompoundSepNormalsOut,
01896                                                                                 int numCompoundPairs,
01897                                                                                 int i
01898                                                                                 )
01899 {
01900 
01901 //      int i = get_global_id(0);
01902         if (i<numCompoundPairs)
01903         {
01904                 int bodyIndexA = gpuCompoundPairs[i].x;
01905                 int bodyIndexB = gpuCompoundPairs[i].y;
01906 
01907                 int childShapeIndexA = gpuCompoundPairs[i].z;
01908                 int childShapeIndexB = gpuCompoundPairs[i].w;
01909                 
01910                 int collidableIndexA = -1;
01911                 int collidableIndexB = -1;
01912                 
01913                 b3Quat ornA = rigidBodies[bodyIndexA].m_quat;
01914                 float4 posA = rigidBodies[bodyIndexA].m_pos;
01915                 
01916                 b3Quat ornB = rigidBodies[bodyIndexB].m_quat;
01917                 float4 posB = rigidBodies[bodyIndexB].m_pos;
01918                                                         
01919                 if (childShapeIndexA >= 0)
01920                 {
01921                         collidableIndexA = gpuChildShapes[childShapeIndexA].m_shapeIndex;
01922                         float4 childPosA = gpuChildShapes[childShapeIndexA].m_childPosition;
01923                         b3Quat  childOrnA = gpuChildShapes[childShapeIndexA].m_childOrientation;
01924                         float4 newPosA = b3QuatRotate(ornA,childPosA)+posA;
01925                         b3Quat newOrnA = b3QuatMul(ornA,childOrnA);
01926                         posA = newPosA;
01927                         ornA = newOrnA;
01928                 } else
01929                 {
01930                         collidableIndexA = rigidBodies[bodyIndexA].m_collidableIdx;
01931                 }
01932                 
01933                 if (childShapeIndexB>=0)
01934                 {
01935                         collidableIndexB = gpuChildShapes[childShapeIndexB].m_shapeIndex;
01936                         float4 childPosB = gpuChildShapes[childShapeIndexB].m_childPosition;
01937                         b3Quat childOrnB = gpuChildShapes[childShapeIndexB].m_childOrientation;
01938                         float4 newPosB = b3QuatRotate(ornB,childPosB)+posB;
01939                         b3Quat newOrnB = b3QuatMul(ornB,childOrnB);
01940                         posB = newPosB;
01941                         ornB = newOrnB;
01942                 } else
01943                 {
01944                         collidableIndexB = rigidBodies[bodyIndexB].m_collidableIdx;     
01945                 }
01946         
01947                 gpuHasCompoundSepNormalsOut[i] = 0;
01948         
01949                 int shapeIndexA = collidables[collidableIndexA].m_shapeIndex;
01950                 int shapeIndexB = collidables[collidableIndexB].m_shapeIndex;
01951         
01952                 int shapeTypeA = collidables[collidableIndexA].m_shapeType;
01953                 int shapeTypeB = collidables[collidableIndexB].m_shapeType;
01954         
01955 
01956                 if ((shapeTypeA != SHAPE_CONVEX_HULL) || (shapeTypeB != SHAPE_CONVEX_HULL))
01957                 {
01958                         return;
01959                 }
01960 
01961                 int hasSeparatingAxis = 5;
01962                                                         
01963         //      int numFacesA = convexShapes[shapeIndexA].m_numFaces;
01964                 float dmin = FLT_MAX;
01965                 posA.w = 0.f;
01966                 posB.w = 0.f;
01967                 float4 c0local = convexShapes[shapeIndexA].m_localCenter;
01968                 float4 c0 = transform(&c0local, &posA, &ornA);
01969                 float4 c1local = convexShapes[shapeIndexB].m_localCenter;
01970                 float4 c1 = transform(&c1local,&posB,&ornB);
01971                 const float4 DeltaC2 = c0 - c1;
01972                 float4 sepNormal = make_float4(1,0,0,0);
01973 //              bool sepA = findSeparatingAxis( convexShapes[shapeIndexA], convexShapes[shapeIndexB],posA,ornA,posB,ornB,DeltaC2,vertices,uniqueEdges,faces,indices,&sepNormal,&dmin);
01974                 bool sepA = findSeparatingAxis( convexShapes[shapeIndexA], convexShapes[shapeIndexB],posA,ornA,posB,ornB,vertices,uniqueEdges,faces,indices,vertices,uniqueEdges,faces,indices,sepNormal);//,&dmin);
01975         
01976                 hasSeparatingAxis = 4;
01977                 if (!sepA)
01978                 {
01979                         hasSeparatingAxis = 0;
01980                 } else
01981                 {
01982                         bool sepB = findSeparatingAxis( convexShapes[shapeIndexB],convexShapes[shapeIndexA],posB,ornB,posA,ornA,vertices,uniqueEdges,faces,indices,vertices,uniqueEdges,faces,indices,sepNormal);//,&dmin);
01983 
01984                         if (!sepB)
01985                         {
01986                                 hasSeparatingAxis = 0;
01987                         } else//(!sepB)
01988                         {
01989                                 bool sepEE = findSeparatingAxisEdgeEdge(        &convexShapes[shapeIndexA], &convexShapes[shapeIndexB],posA,ornA,posB,ornB,DeltaC2,vertices,uniqueEdges,faces,indices,&sepNormal,&dmin);
01990                                 if (sepEE)
01991                                 {
01992                                                 gpuCompoundSepNormalsOut[i] = sepNormal;//fastNormalize4(sepNormal);
01993                                                 gpuHasCompoundSepNormalsOut[i] = 1;
01994                                 }//sepEE
01995                         }//(!sepB)
01996                 }//(!sepA)
01997                 
01998                 
01999         }
02000                 
02001 }
02002 
02003 
02004 __kernel void   clipCompoundsHullHullKernel( __global const b3Int4* gpuCompoundPairs, 
02005                                                                                                                                                                         __global const b3RigidBodyData* rigidBodies, 
02006                                                                                                                                                                         __global const b3Collidable* collidables,
02007                                                                                                                                                                         __global const b3ConvexPolyhedronData* convexShapes, 
02008                                                                                                                                                                         __global const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Float4>& vertices,
02009                                                                                                                                                                         __global const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Float4>& uniqueEdges,
02010                                                                                                                                                                         __global const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3GpuFace>& faces,
02011                                                                                                                                                                         __global const b3AlignedObjectArray<int>& indices,
02012                                                                                                                                                                         __global const b3GpuChildShape* gpuChildShapes,
02013                                                                                                                                                                         __global const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Float4>& gpuCompoundSepNormalsOut,
02014                                                                                                                                                                         __global const b3AlignedObjectArray<int>& gpuHasCompoundSepNormalsOut,
02015                                                                                                                                                                         __global struct b3Contact4Data* globalContactsOut,
02016                                                                                                                                                                         int* nGlobalContactsOut,
02017                                                                                                                                                                         int numCompoundPairs, int maxContactCapacity, int i)
02018 {
02019 
02020 //      int i = get_global_id(0);
02021         int pairIndex = i;
02022         
02023         float4 worldVertsB1[64];
02024         float4 worldVertsB2[64];
02025         int capacityWorldVerts = 64;    
02026 
02027         float4 localContactsOut[64];
02028         int localContactCapacity=64;
02029         
02030         float minDist = -1e30f;
02031         float maxDist = 0.0f;
02032 
02033         if (i<numCompoundPairs)
02034         {
02035 
02036                 if (gpuHasCompoundSepNormalsOut[i])
02037                 {
02038 
02039                         int bodyIndexA = gpuCompoundPairs[i].x;
02040                         int bodyIndexB = gpuCompoundPairs[i].y;
02041                         
02042                         int childShapeIndexA = gpuCompoundPairs[i].z;
02043                         int childShapeIndexB = gpuCompoundPairs[i].w;
02044                         
02045                         int collidableIndexA = -1;
02046                         int collidableIndexB = -1;
02047                         
02048                         b3Quat ornA = rigidBodies[bodyIndexA].m_quat;
02049                         float4 posA = rigidBodies[bodyIndexA].m_pos;
02050                         
02051                         b3Quat ornB = rigidBodies[bodyIndexB].m_quat;
02052                         float4 posB = rigidBodies[bodyIndexB].m_pos;
02053                                                                 
02054                         if (childShapeIndexA >= 0)
02055                         {
02056                                 collidableIndexA = gpuChildShapes[childShapeIndexA].m_shapeIndex;
02057                                 float4 childPosA = gpuChildShapes[childShapeIndexA].m_childPosition;
02058                                 b3Quat childOrnA = gpuChildShapes[childShapeIndexA].m_childOrientation;
02059                                 float4 newPosA = b3QuatRotate(ornA,childPosA)+posA;
02060                                 b3Quat newOrnA = b3QuatMul(ornA,childOrnA);
02061                                 posA = newPosA;
02062                                 ornA = newOrnA;
02063                         } else
02064                         {
02065                                 collidableIndexA = rigidBodies[bodyIndexA].m_collidableIdx;
02066                         }
02067                         
02068                         if (childShapeIndexB>=0)
02069                         {
02070                                 collidableIndexB = gpuChildShapes[childShapeIndexB].m_shapeIndex;
02071                                 float4 childPosB = gpuChildShapes[childShapeIndexB].m_childPosition;
02072                                 b3Quat  childOrnB = gpuChildShapes[childShapeIndexB].m_childOrientation;
02073                                 float4 newPosB = b3QuatRotate(ornB,childPosB)+posB;
02074                                 b3Quat  newOrnB = b3QuatMul(ornB,childOrnB);
02075                                 posB = newPosB;
02076                                 ornB = newOrnB;
02077                         } else
02078                         {
02079                                 collidableIndexB = rigidBodies[bodyIndexB].m_collidableIdx;     
02080                         }
02081                         
02082                         int shapeIndexA = collidables[collidableIndexA].m_shapeIndex;
02083                         int shapeIndexB = collidables[collidableIndexB].m_shapeIndex;
02084                 
02085                         int numLocalContactsOut = clipHullAgainstHull(gpuCompoundSepNormalsOut[i],
02086                                                                                                                 convexShapes[shapeIndexA], convexShapes[shapeIndexB],
02087                                                                                                                 posA,ornA,
02088                                                                                                           posB,ornB,
02089                                                                                                           worldVertsB1,worldVertsB2,capacityWorldVerts,
02090                                                                                                                 minDist, maxDist,
02091                                                                                                                 vertices,faces,indices,
02092                                                                                                                 vertices,faces,indices,
02093                                                                                                                 localContactsOut,localContactCapacity);
02094                                                                                                 
02095                 if (numLocalContactsOut>0)
02096                 {
02097                                 float4 normal = -gpuCompoundSepNormalsOut[i];
02098                                 int nPoints = numLocalContactsOut;
02099                                 float4* pointsIn = localContactsOut;
02100                                 b3Int4 contactIdx;// = {-1,-1,-1,-1};
02101 
02102                                 contactIdx.s[0] = 0;
02103                                 contactIdx.s[1] = 1;
02104                                 contactIdx.s[2] = 2;
02105                                 contactIdx.s[3] = 3;
02106 
02107                                 int nReducedContacts = extractManifoldSequentialGlobal(pointsIn, nPoints, normal, &contactIdx);
02108                 
02109                                 int dstIdx;
02110                                 dstIdx = b3AtomicInc( nGlobalContactsOut);
02111                                 if ((dstIdx+nReducedContacts) < maxContactCapacity)
02112                                 {
02113                                         __global struct b3Contact4Data* c = globalContactsOut+ dstIdx;
02114                                         c->m_worldNormalOnB = -normal;
02115                                         c->m_restituitionCoeffCmp = (0.f*0xffff);c->m_frictionCoeffCmp = (0.7f*0xffff);
02116                                         c->m_batchIdx = pairIndex;
02117                                         int bodyA = gpuCompoundPairs[pairIndex].x;
02118                                         int bodyB = gpuCompoundPairs[pairIndex].y;
02119                                         c->m_bodyAPtrAndSignBit = rigidBodies[bodyA].m_invMass==0?-bodyA:bodyA;
02120                                         c->m_bodyBPtrAndSignBit = rigidBodies[bodyB].m_invMass==0?-bodyB:bodyB;
02121                                         c->m_childIndexA = childShapeIndexA;
02122                                         c->m_childIndexB = childShapeIndexB;
02123                                         for (int i=0;i<nReducedContacts;i++)
02124                                         {
02125                                                 c->m_worldPosB[i] = pointsIn[contactIdx.s[i]];
02126                                         }
02127                                         b3Contact4Data_setNumPoints(c,nReducedContacts);
02128                                 }
02129                                 
02130                         }//             if (numContactsOut>0)
02131                 }//             if (gpuHasCompoundSepNormalsOut[i])
02132         }//     if (i<numCompoundPairs)
02133 
02134 }
02135

02137 void computeContactCompoundCompound(int pairIndex,
02138                                                                                                                                 int bodyIndexA, int bodyIndexB, 
02139                                                                                                                                 int collidableIndexA, int collidableIndexB, 
02140                                                                                                                                 const b3RigidBodyData* rigidBodies, 
02141                                                                                                                                 const b3Collidable* collidables,
02142                                                                                                                                 const b3ConvexPolyhedronData* convexShapes,
02143                                                                                                                                 const b3GpuChildShape* cpuChildShapes,
02144                                                                                                                                 const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Aabb>& hostAabbsWorldSpace,
02145                                                                                                                                 const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Aabb>& hostAabbsLocalSpace,
02146 
02147                                                                                                                                 const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Vector3>& convexVertices,
02148                                                                                                                                 const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Vector3>& hostUniqueEdges,
02149                                                                                                                                 const b3AlignedObjectArray<int>& convexIndices,
02150                                                                                                                                 const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3GpuFace>& faces,
02151                                                                                                                                 
02152                                                                                                                                 b3Contact4* globalContactsOut,
02153                                                                                                                                 int& nGlobalContactsOut,
02154                                                                                                                                 int maxContactCapacity,
02155                                                                                                                                 b3AlignedObjectArray<b3QuantizedBvhNode>&       treeNodesCPU,
02156                                                                                                                                 b3AlignedObjectArray<b3BvhSubtreeInfo>& subTreesCPU,
02157                                                                                                                                 b3AlignedObjectArray<b3BvhInfo>&        bvhInfoCPU
02158                                                                                                                                 )
02159 {
02160 
02161         int shapeTypeB = collidables[collidableIndexB].m_shapeType;
02162         b3Assert(shapeTypeB == SHAPE_COMPOUND_OF_CONVEX_HULLS);
02163 
02164         b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Int4> cpuCompoundPairsOut;
02165         int numCompoundPairsOut=0;
02166         int maxNumCompoundPairsCapacity = 8192;//1024;
02167         cpuCompoundPairsOut.resize(maxNumCompoundPairsCapacity);
02168 
02169         // work-in-progress
02170         findCompoundPairsKernel( 
02171                                                         pairIndex,
02172                                                         bodyIndexA,bodyIndexB,
02173                                                         collidableIndexA,collidableIndexB,
02174                                                         rigidBodies, 
02175                                                         collidables,
02176                                                         convexShapes, 
02177                                                         convexVertices,
02178                                                         hostAabbsWorldSpace,
02179                                                         hostAabbsLocalSpace,
02180                                                         cpuChildShapes,
02181                                                         &cpuCompoundPairsOut[0],
02182                                                         &numCompoundPairsOut,
02183                                                         maxNumCompoundPairsCapacity     ,
02184                                                         treeNodesCPU,
02185                                                         subTreesCPU,
02186                                                         bvhInfoCPU
02187                                                         );
02188 
02189         printf("maxNumAabbChecks=%d\n",maxNumAabbChecks);
02190         if (numCompoundPairsOut>maxNumCompoundPairsCapacity)
02191         {
02192                 b3Error("numCompoundPairsOut exceeded maxNumCompoundPairsCapacity (%d)\n",maxNumCompoundPairsCapacity);
02193                 numCompoundPairsOut=maxNumCompoundPairsCapacity;
02194         }
02195         b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Float4> cpuCompoundSepNormalsOut;
02196         b3AlignedObjectArray<int> cpuHasCompoundSepNormalsOut;
02197         cpuCompoundSepNormalsOut.resize(numCompoundPairsOut);
02198         cpuHasCompoundSepNormalsOut.resize(numCompoundPairsOut);
02199 
02200         for (int i=0;i<numCompoundPairsOut;i++)
02201         {
02202 
02203                 processCompoundPairsKernel(&cpuCompoundPairsOut[0],rigidBodies,collidables,convexShapes,convexVertices,hostUniqueEdges,faces,convexIndices,0,cpuChildShapes,
02204                         cpuCompoundSepNormalsOut,cpuHasCompoundSepNormalsOut,numCompoundPairsOut,i);
02205         }
02206 
02207         for (int i=0;i<numCompoundPairsOut;i++)
02208         {
02209                 clipCompoundsHullHullKernel(&cpuCompoundPairsOut[0],rigidBodies,collidables,convexShapes,convexVertices,hostUniqueEdges,faces,convexIndices,cpuChildShapes,
02210                         cpuCompoundSepNormalsOut,cpuHasCompoundSepNormalsOut,globalContactsOut,&nGlobalContactsOut,numCompoundPairsOut,maxContactCapacity,i);
02211         }
02212                 /*
02213                 int childColIndexA = gpuChildShapes[childShapeIndexA].m_shapeIndex;
02214 
02215                                         float4 posA = rigidBodies[bodyIndexA].m_pos;
02216                                         b3Quat ornA = rigidBodies[bodyIndexA].m_quat;
02217                                         float4 childPosA = gpuChildShapes[childShapeIndexA].m_childPosition;
02218                                         b3Quat childOrnA = gpuChildShapes[childShapeIndexA].m_childOrientation;
02219                                         float4 newPosA = b3QuatRotate(ornA,childPosA)+posA;
02220                                         b3Quat newOrnA = b3QuatMul(ornA,childOrnA);
02221 
02222                                         int shapeIndexA = collidables[childColIndexA].m_shapeIndex;
02223 
02224 
02225                         bool foundSepAxis = findSeparatingAxis(hullA,hullB,
02226                                                         posA,
02227                                                         ornA,
02228                                                         posB,
02229                                                         ornB,
02230 
02231                                                         convexVertices,uniqueEdges,faces,convexIndices,
02232                                                         convexVertices,uniqueEdges,faces,convexIndices,
02233                                                         
02234                                                         sepNormalWorldSpace
02235                                                         );
02236                                                         */
02237 
02238         
02239         /*
02240         if (foundSepAxis)
02241         {
02242                 
02243                 
02244                 contactIndex = clipHullHullSingle(
02245                         bodyIndexA, bodyIndexB,
02246                                                    posA,ornA,
02247                                                    posB,ornB,
02248                         collidableIndexA, collidableIndexB,
02249                         &rigidBodies,

02272         */

02274 //      return contactIndex;
02275

02279         for (int c=0;c<numChildrenB;c++)
02280         {

02282                 int childColIndexB = cpuChildShapes[childShapeIndexB].m_shapeIndex;
