02299 
02300 void computeContactPlaneCompound(int pairIndex,
02301                                                                                                                                 int bodyIndexA, int bodyIndexB, 
02302                                                                                                                                 int collidableIndexA, int collidableIndexB, 
02303                                                                                                                                 const b3RigidBodyData* rigidBodies, 
02304                                                                                                                                 const b3Collidable* collidables,
02305                                                                                                                                 const b3ConvexPolyhedronData* convexShapes,
02306                                                                                                                                 const b3GpuChildShape* cpuChildShapes,
02307                                                                                                                                 const b3Vector3* convexVertices,
02308                                                                                                                                 const int* convexIndices,
02309                                                                                                                                 const b3GpuFace* faces,
02310                                                                                                                                 
02311                                                                                                                                 b3Contact4* globalContactsOut,
02312                                                                                                                                 int& nGlobalContactsOut,
02313                                                                                                                                 int maxContactCapacity)
02314 {
02315 
02316         int shapeTypeB = collidables[collidableIndexB].m_shapeType;
02317         b3Assert(shapeTypeB == SHAPE_COMPOUND_OF_CONVEX_HULLS);
02318 
02319 
02320         int numChildrenB = collidables[collidableIndexB].m_numChildShapes;
02321         for (int c=0;c<numChildrenB;c++)
02322         {
02323                 int childShapeIndexB = collidables[collidableIndexB].m_shapeIndex+c;
02324                 int childColIndexB = cpuChildShapes[childShapeIndexB].m_shapeIndex;
02325 
02326                 float4 rootPosB = rigidBodies[bodyIndexB].m_pos;
02327                 b3Quaternion rootOrnB = rigidBodies[bodyIndexB].m_quat;
02328                 b3Vector3 childPosB = cpuChildShapes[childShapeIndexB].m_childPosition;
02329                 b3Quaternion childOrnB = cpuChildShapes[childShapeIndexB].m_childOrientation;
02330                 float4  posB = b3QuatRotate(rootOrnB,childPosB)+rootPosB;
02331                 b3Quaternion ornB = rootOrnB*childOrnB;//b3QuatMul(ornB,childOrnB);
02332 
02333                 int shapeIndexB = collidables[childColIndexB].m_shapeIndex;
02334 
02335                 const b3ConvexPolyhedronData* hullB = &convexShapes[shapeIndexB];
02336         
02337                 
02338                 b3Vector3 posA = rigidBodies[bodyIndexA].m_pos;
02339                 b3Quaternion ornA = rigidBodies[bodyIndexA].m_quat;
02340 
02341         //      int numContactsOut = 0;
02342         //      int numWorldVertsB1= 0;
02343 
02344                 b3Vector3 planeEq = faces[collidables[collidableIndexA].m_shapeIndex].m_plane;
02345                 b3Vector3 planeNormal=b3MakeVector3(planeEq.x,planeEq.y,planeEq.z);
02346                 b3Vector3 planeNormalWorld = b3QuatRotate(ornA,planeNormal);
02347                 float planeConstant = planeEq.w;
02348                 b3Transform convexWorldTransform;
02349                 convexWorldTransform.setIdentity();
02350                 convexWorldTransform.setOrigin(posB);
02351                 convexWorldTransform.setRotation(ornB);
02352                 b3Transform planeTransform;
02353                 planeTransform.setIdentity();
02354                 planeTransform.setOrigin(posA);
02355                 planeTransform.setRotation(ornA);
02356 
02357                 b3Transform planeInConvex;
02358                 planeInConvex= convexWorldTransform.inverse() * planeTransform;
02359                 b3Transform convexInPlane;
02360                 convexInPlane = planeTransform.inverse() * convexWorldTransform;
02361         
02362                 b3Vector3 planeNormalInConvex = planeInConvex.getBasis()*-planeNormal;
02363                 float maxDot = -1e30;
02364                 int hitVertex=-1;
02365                 b3Vector3 hitVtx;
02366 
02367         #define MAX_PLANE_CONVEX_POINTS 64
02368 
02369                 b3Vector3 contactPoints[MAX_PLANE_CONVEX_POINTS];
02370                 int numPoints = 0;
02371 
02372                 b3Int4 contactIdx;
02373                 contactIdx.s[0] = 0;
02374                 contactIdx.s[1] = 1;
02375                 contactIdx.s[2] = 2;
02376                 contactIdx.s[3] = 3;
02377         
02378                 for (int i=0;i<hullB->m_numVertices;i++)
02379                 {
02380                         b3Vector3 vtx = convexVertices[hullB->m_vertexOffset+i];
02381                         float curDot = vtx.dot(planeNormalInConvex);
02382 
02383 
02384                         if (curDot>maxDot)
02385                         {
02386                                 hitVertex=i;
02387                                 maxDot=curDot;
02388                                 hitVtx = vtx;
02389                                 //make sure the deepest points is always included
02390                                 if (numPoints==MAX_PLANE_CONVEX_POINTS)
02391                                         numPoints--;
02392                         }
02393 
02394                         if (numPoints<MAX_PLANE_CONVEX_POINTS)
02395                         {
02396                                 b3Vector3 vtxWorld = convexWorldTransform*vtx;
02397                                 b3Vector3 vtxInPlane = planeTransform.inverse()*vtxWorld;
02398                                 float dist = planeNormal.dot(vtxInPlane)-planeConstant;
02399                                 if (dist<0.f)
02400                                 {
02401                                         vtxWorld.w = dist;
02402                                         contactPoints[numPoints] = vtxWorld;
02403                                         numPoints++;
02404                                 }
02405                         }
02406 
02407                 }
02408 
02409                 int numReducedPoints  = 0;
02410 
02411                 numReducedPoints = numPoints;
02412         
02413                 if (numPoints>4)
02414                 {
02415                         numReducedPoints = extractManifoldSequentialGlobal( contactPoints, numPoints, planeNormalInConvex, &contactIdx);
02416                 }
02417                 int dstIdx;
02418         //    dstIdx = nGlobalContactsOut++;//AppendInc( nGlobalContactsOut, dstIdx );
02419                 
02420                 if (numReducedPoints>0)
02421                 {
02422                         if (nGlobalContactsOut < maxContactCapacity)
02423                         {
02424                                 dstIdx=nGlobalContactsOut;
02425                                 nGlobalContactsOut++;
02426 
02427                                 b3Contact4* c = &globalContactsOut[dstIdx];
02428                                 c->m_worldNormalOnB = -planeNormalWorld;
02429                                 c->setFrictionCoeff(0.7);
02430                                 c->setRestituitionCoeff(0.f);
02431 
02432                                 c->m_batchIdx = pairIndex;
02433                                 c->m_bodyAPtrAndSignBit = rigidBodies[bodyIndexA].m_invMass==0?-bodyIndexA:bodyIndexA;
02434                                 c->m_bodyBPtrAndSignBit = rigidBodies[bodyIndexB].m_invMass==0?-bodyIndexB:bodyIndexB;
02435                                 for (int i=0;i<numReducedPoints;i++)
02436                                 {
02437                                         b3Vector3 pOnB1 = contactPoints[contactIdx.s[i]];
02438                                         c->m_worldPosB[i] = pOnB1;
02439                                 }
02440                                 c->m_worldNormalOnB.w = (b3Scalar)numReducedPoints;
02441                         }//if (dstIdx < numPairs)
02442                 }       
02443                 
02444         }
02445 
02446         
02447 }
02448 
02449 
02450 
02451 
02452 
02453 void    computeContactSphereConvex(int pairIndex,
02454                                                                                                                                 int bodyIndexA, int bodyIndexB, 
02455                                                                                                                                 int collidableIndexA, int collidableIndexB, 
02456                                                                                                                                 const b3RigidBodyData* rigidBodies, 
02457                                                                                                                                 const b3Collidable* collidables,
02458                                                                                                                                 const b3ConvexPolyhedronData* convexShapes,
02459                                                                                                                                 const b3Vector3* convexVertices,
02460                                                                                                                                 const int* convexIndices,
02461                                                                                                                                 const b3GpuFace* faces,
02462                                                                                                                                 b3Contact4* globalContactsOut,
02463                                                                                                                                 int& nGlobalContactsOut,
02464                                                                                                                                 int maxContactCapacity)
02465 {
02466 
02467         float radius = collidables[collidableIndexA].m_radius;
02468         float4 spherePos1 = rigidBodies[bodyIndexA].m_pos;
02469         b3Quaternion sphereOrn = rigidBodies[bodyIndexA].m_quat;
02470 
02471 
02472 
02473         float4 pos = rigidBodies[bodyIndexB].m_pos;
02474         
02475 
02476         b3Quaternion quat = rigidBodies[bodyIndexB].m_quat;
02477 
02478         b3Transform tr;
02479         tr.setIdentity();
02480         tr.setOrigin(pos);
02481         tr.setRotation(quat);
02482         b3Transform trInv = tr.inverse();
02483 
02484         float4 spherePos = trInv(spherePos1);
02485 
02486         int collidableIndex = rigidBodies[bodyIndexB].m_collidableIdx;
02487         int shapeIndex = collidables[collidableIndex].m_shapeIndex;
02488         int numFaces = convexShapes[shapeIndex].m_numFaces;
02489         float4 closestPnt = b3MakeVector3(0, 0, 0, 0);
02490 //      float4 hitNormalWorld = b3MakeVector3(0, 0, 0, 0);
02491         float minDist = -1000000.f; // TODO: What is the largest/smallest float?
02492         bool bCollide = true;
02493         int region = -1;
02494         float4 localHitNormal;
02495         for ( int f = 0; f < numFaces; f++ )
02496         {
02497                 b3GpuFace face = faces[convexShapes[shapeIndex].m_faceOffset+f];
02498                 float4 planeEqn;
02499                 float4 localPlaneNormal = b3MakeVector3(face.m_plane.x,face.m_plane.y,face.m_plane.z,0.f);
02500                 float4 n1 = localPlaneNormal;//quatRotate(quat,localPlaneNormal);
02501                 planeEqn = n1;
02502                 planeEqn[3] = face.m_plane.w;
02503 
02504                 float4 pntReturn;
02505                 float dist = signedDistanceFromPointToPlane(spherePos, planeEqn, &pntReturn);
02506 
02507                 if ( dist > radius)
02508                 {
02509                         bCollide = false;
02510                         break;
02511                 }
02512 
02513                 if ( dist > 0 )
02514                 {
02515                         //might hit an edge or vertex
02516                         b3Vector3 out;
02517 
02518                         bool isInPoly = IsPointInPolygon(spherePos,
02519                                         &face,
02520                                         &convexVertices[convexShapes[shapeIndex].m_vertexOffset],
02521                                         convexIndices,
02522                     &out);
02523                         if (isInPoly)
02524                         {
02525                                 if (dist>minDist)
02526                                 {
02527                                         minDist = dist;
02528                                         closestPnt = pntReturn;
02529                                         localHitNormal = planeEqn;
02530                                         region=1;
02531                                 }
02532                         } else
02533                         {
02534                                 b3Vector3 tmp = spherePos-out;
02535                                 b3Scalar l2 = tmp.length2();
02536                                 if (l2<radius*radius)
02537                                 {
02538                                         dist  = b3Sqrt(l2);
02539                                         if (dist>minDist)
02540                                         {
02541                                                 minDist = dist;
02542                                                 closestPnt = out;
02543                                                 localHitNormal = tmp/dist;
02544                                                 region=2;
02545                                         }
02546                                         
02547                                 } else
02548                                 {
02549                                         bCollide = false;
02550                                         break;
02551                                 }
02552                         }
02553                 }
02554                 else
02555                 {
02556                         if ( dist > minDist )
02557                         {
02558                                 minDist = dist;
02559                                 closestPnt = pntReturn;
02560                                 localHitNormal = planeEqn;
02561                                 region=3;
02562                         }
02563                 }
02564         }
02565         static int numChecks = 0;
02566         numChecks++;
02567 
02568         if (bCollide && minDist > -10000)
02569         {
02570                 
02571                 float4 normalOnSurfaceB1 = tr.getBasis()*localHitNormal;//-hitNormalWorld;
02572                 float4 pOnB1 = tr(closestPnt);
02573                 //printf("dist ,%f,",minDist);
02574                 float actualDepth = minDist-radius;
02575                 if (actualDepth<0)
02576                 {
02577                 //printf("actualDepth = ,%f,", actualDepth);
02578                 //printf("normalOnSurfaceB1 = ,%f,%f,%f,", normalOnSurfaceB1.x,normalOnSurfaceB1.y,normalOnSurfaceB1.z);
02579                 //printf("region=,%d,\n", region);
02580                 pOnB1[3] = actualDepth;
02581 
02582                 int dstIdx;
02583 //    dstIdx = nGlobalContactsOut++;//AppendInc( nGlobalContactsOut, dstIdx );
02584                 
02585                 if (nGlobalContactsOut < maxContactCapacity)
02586                 {
02587                         dstIdx=nGlobalContactsOut;
02588                         nGlobalContactsOut++;
02589 
02590                         b3Contact4* c = &globalContactsOut[dstIdx];
02591                         c->m_worldNormalOnB = normalOnSurfaceB1;
02592                         c->setFrictionCoeff(0.7);
02593                         c->setRestituitionCoeff(0.f);
02594 
02595                         c->m_batchIdx = pairIndex;
02596                         c->m_bodyAPtrAndSignBit = rigidBodies[bodyIndexA].m_invMass==0?-bodyIndexA:bodyIndexA;
02597                         c->m_bodyBPtrAndSignBit = rigidBodies[bodyIndexB].m_invMass==0?-bodyIndexB:bodyIndexB;
02598                         c->m_worldPosB[0] = pOnB1;
02599                         int numPoints = 1;
02600                         c->m_worldNormalOnB.w = (b3Scalar)numPoints;
02601                 }//if (dstIdx < numPairs)
02602                 }
02603         }//if (hasCollision)
02604         
02605 }
02606 
02607 
02608 
02609 
02610 int computeContactConvexConvex2(
02611                                                                                                                                 int pairIndex,
02612                                                                                                                                 int bodyIndexA, int bodyIndexB, 
02613                                                                                                                                 int collidableIndexA, int collidableIndexB, 
02614                                                                                                                                 const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3RigidBodyData>& rigidBodies, 
02615                                                                                                                                 const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Collidable>& collidables,
02616                                                                                                                                 const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3ConvexPolyhedronData>& convexShapes,
02617                                                                                                                                 const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Vector3>& convexVertices,
02618                                                                                                                                 const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Vector3>& uniqueEdges,
02619                                                                                                                                 const b3AlignedObjectArray<int>& convexIndices,
02620                                                                                                                                 const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3GpuFace>& faces,
02621                                                                                                                                 b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Contact4>& globalContactsOut,
02622                                                                                                                                 int& nGlobalContactsOut,
02623                                                                                                                                 int maxContactCapacity,
02624                                                                                                                                 const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Contact4>& oldContacts
02625                                                                                                                                 )
02626 {
02627         int contactIndex = -1;
02628         b3Vector3 posA = rigidBodies[bodyIndexA].m_pos;
02629         b3Quaternion ornA = rigidBodies[bodyIndexA].m_quat;
02630         b3Vector3 posB = rigidBodies[bodyIndexB].m_pos;
02631         b3Quaternion ornB = rigidBodies[bodyIndexB].m_quat;
02632         
02633 
02634         b3ConvexPolyhedronData hullA, hullB;
02635     
02636         b3Vector3 sepNormalWorldSpace;
02637 
02638         
02639 
02640     b3Collidable colA = collidables[collidableIndexA];
02641     hullA = convexShapes[colA.m_shapeIndex];
02642     //printf("numvertsA = %d\n",hullA.m_numVertices);
02643     
02644     
02645     b3Collidable colB = collidables[collidableIndexB];
02646     hullB = convexShapes[colB.m_shapeIndex];
02647     //printf("numvertsB = %d\n",hullB.m_numVertices);
02648 
02649 //      int contactCapacity = MAX_VERTS;
02650         //int numContactsOut=0;
02651 
02652 
02653 #ifdef _WIN32
02654         b3Assert(_finite(rigidBodies[bodyIndexA].m_pos.x));
02655         b3Assert(_finite(rigidBodies[bodyIndexB].m_pos.x));
02656 #endif
02657         
02658                 bool foundSepAxis = findSeparatingAxis(hullA,hullB,
02659                                                         posA,
02660                                                         ornA,
02661                                                         posB,
02662                                                         ornB,
02663 
02664                                                         convexVertices,uniqueEdges,faces,convexIndices,
02665                                                         convexVertices,uniqueEdges,faces,convexIndices,
02666                                                         
02667                                                         sepNormalWorldSpace
02668                                                         );
02669 
02670         
02671         if (foundSepAxis)
02672         {
02673                 
02674                 
02675                 contactIndex = clipHullHullSingle(
02676                         bodyIndexA, bodyIndexB,
02677                                                    posA,ornA,
02678                                                    posB,ornB,
02679                         collidableIndexA, collidableIndexB,
02680                         &rigidBodies, 
02681                         &globalContactsOut,
02682                         nGlobalContactsOut,
02683                         
02684                         convexShapes,
02685                         convexShapes,
02686         
02687                         convexVertices, 
02688                         uniqueEdges, 
02689                         faces,
02690                         convexIndices,
02691         
02692                         convexVertices,
02693                         uniqueEdges,
02694                         faces,
02695                         convexIndices,
02696 
02697                         collidables,
02698                         collidables,
02699                         sepNormalWorldSpace,
02700                         maxContactCapacity);
02701                         
02702         }
02703 
02704         return contactIndex;
02705 }
02706 
02707 
02708 
02709 
02710 
02711                                                                                                                                 
02712                                                                                                                                 
02713 void GpuSatCollision::computeConvexConvexContactsGPUSAT( b3OpenCLArray<b3Int4>* pairs, int nPairs,
02714                         const b3OpenCLArray<b3RigidBodyData>* bodyBuf,
02715                         b3OpenCLArray<b3Contact4>* contactOut, int& nContacts,
02716                         const b3OpenCLArray<b3Contact4>* oldContacts,
02717                         int maxContactCapacity,
02718                         int compoundPairCapacity,
02719                         const b3OpenCLArray<b3ConvexPolyhedronData>& convexData,
02720                         const b3OpenCLArray<b3Vector3>& gpuVertices,
02721                         const b3OpenCLArray<b3Vector3>& gpuUniqueEdges,
02722                         const b3OpenCLArray<b3GpuFace>& gpuFaces,
02723                         const b3OpenCLArray<int>& gpuIndices,
02724                         const b3OpenCLArray<b3Collidable>& gpuCollidables,
02725                         const b3OpenCLArray<b3GpuChildShape>& gpuChildShapes,
02726 
02727                         const b3OpenCLArray<b3Aabb>& clAabbsWorldSpace,
02728                         const b3OpenCLArray<b3Aabb>& clAabbsLocalSpace,
02729 
02730             b3OpenCLArray<b3Vector3>& worldVertsB1GPU,
02731             b3OpenCLArray<b3Int4>& clippingFacesOutGPU,
02732             b3OpenCLArray<b3Vector3>& worldNormalsAGPU,
02733             b3OpenCLArray<b3Vector3>& worldVertsA1GPU,
02734             b3OpenCLArray<b3Vector3>& worldVertsB2GPU,    
02735                         b3AlignedObjectArray<class b3OptimizedBvh*>& bvhDataUnused,
02736                         b3OpenCLArray<b3QuantizedBvhNode>*      treeNodesGPU,
02737                         b3OpenCLArray<b3BvhSubtreeInfo>*        subTreesGPU,
02738                         b3OpenCLArray<b3BvhInfo>*       bvhInfo,
02739 
02740                         int numObjects,
02741                         int maxTriConvexPairCapacity,
02742                         b3OpenCLArray<b3Int4>& triangleConvexPairsOut,
02743                         int& numTriConvexPairsOut
02744                         )
02745 {
02746         myframecount++;
02747 
02748         if (!nPairs)
02749                 return;
02750 
02751 #ifdef CHECK_ON_HOST
02752 
02753 
02754         b3AlignedObjectArray<b3QuantizedBvhNode>        treeNodesCPU;
02755         treeNodesGPU->copyToHost(treeNodesCPU);
02756 
02757         b3AlignedObjectArray<b3BvhSubtreeInfo>  subTreesCPU;
02758         subTreesGPU->copyToHost(subTreesCPU);
02759 
02760         b3AlignedObjectArray<b3BvhInfo> bvhInfoCPU;
02761         bvhInfo->copyToHost(bvhInfoCPU);
02762 
02763         b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Aabb> hostAabbsWorldSpace;
02764         clAabbsWorldSpace.copyToHost(hostAabbsWorldSpace);
02765 
02766         b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Aabb> hostAabbsLocalSpace;
02767         clAabbsLocalSpace.copyToHost(hostAabbsLocalSpace);
02768 
02769         b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Int4> hostPairs;
02770         pairs->copyToHost(hostPairs);
02771 
02772         b3AlignedObjectArray<b3RigidBodyData> hostBodyBuf;
02773         bodyBuf->copyToHost(hostBodyBuf);
02774 
02775         
02776 
02777         b3AlignedObjectArray<b3ConvexPolyhedronData> hostConvexData;
02778         convexData.copyToHost(hostConvexData);
02779 
02780         b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Vector3> hostVertices;
02781         gpuVertices.copyToHost(hostVertices);
02782 
02783         b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Vector3> hostUniqueEdges;
02784         gpuUniqueEdges.copyToHost(hostUniqueEdges);
02785         b3AlignedObjectArray<b3GpuFace> hostFaces;
02786         gpuFaces.copyToHost(hostFaces);
02787         b3AlignedObjectArray<int> hostIndices;
02788         gpuIndices.copyToHost(hostIndices);
02789         b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Collidable> hostCollidables;
02790         gpuCollidables.copyToHost(hostCollidables);
02791         
02792         b3AlignedObjectArray<b3GpuChildShape> cpuChildShapes;
02793         gpuChildShapes.copyToHost(cpuChildShapes);
02794         
02795 
02796         b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Int4> hostTriangleConvexPairs;
02797 
02798         b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Contact4> hostContacts;
02799         if (nContacts)
02800         {
02801                 contactOut->copyToHost(hostContacts);
02802         }
02803 
02804         b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Contact4> oldHostContacts;
02805         
02806         if (oldContacts->size())
02807         {
02808                 oldContacts->copyToHost(oldHostContacts);
02809         }
02810 
02811 
02812         hostContacts.resize(maxContactCapacity);
02813 
02814         for (int i=0;i<nPairs;i++)
02815         {
02816                 int bodyIndexA = hostPairs[i].x;
02817                 int bodyIndexB = hostPairs[i].y;
02818                 int collidableIndexA = hostBodyBuf[bodyIndexA].m_collidableIdx;
02819                 int collidableIndexB = hostBodyBuf[bodyIndexB].m_collidableIdx;
02820 
02821                 if (hostCollidables[collidableIndexA].m_shapeType == SHAPE_SPHERE &&
02822                         hostCollidables[collidableIndexB].m_shapeType == SHAPE_CONVEX_HULL)
02823                 {
02824                         computeContactSphereConvex(i,bodyIndexA,bodyIndexB,collidableIndexA,collidableIndexB,&hostBodyBuf[0],
02825                                 &hostCollidables[0],&hostConvexData[0],&hostVertices[0],&hostIndices[0],&hostFaces[0],&hostContacts[0],nContacts,maxContactCapacity);
02826                 }
02827 
02828                 if (hostCollidables[collidableIndexA].m_shapeType == SHAPE_CONVEX_HULL &&
02829                         hostCollidables[collidableIndexB].m_shapeType == SHAPE_SPHERE)
02830                 {
02831                         computeContactSphereConvex(i,bodyIndexB,bodyIndexA,collidableIndexB,collidableIndexA,&hostBodyBuf[0],
02832                                 &hostCollidables[0],&hostConvexData[0],&hostVertices[0],&hostIndices[0],&hostFaces[0],&hostContacts[0],nContacts,maxContactCapacity);
02833                         //printf("convex-sphere\n");
02834                         
02835                 }
02836 
02837                 if (hostCollidables[collidableIndexA].m_shapeType == SHAPE_CONVEX_HULL &&
02838                         hostCollidables[collidableIndexB].m_shapeType == SHAPE_PLANE)
02839                 {
02840                         computeContactPlaneConvex(i,bodyIndexB,bodyIndexA,collidableIndexB,collidableIndexA,&hostBodyBuf[0],
02841                         &hostCollidables[0],&hostConvexData[0],&hostVertices[0],&hostIndices[0],&hostFaces[0],&hostContacts[0],nContacts,maxContactCapacity);
02842 //                      printf("convex-plane\n");
02843                         
02844                 }
02845 
02846                 if (hostCollidables[collidableIndexA].m_shapeType == SHAPE_PLANE &&
02847                         hostCollidables[collidableIndexB].m_shapeType == SHAPE_CONVEX_HULL)
02848                 {
02849                         computeContactPlaneConvex(i,bodyIndexA,bodyIndexB,collidableIndexA,collidableIndexB,&hostBodyBuf[0],
02850                         &hostCollidables[0],&hostConvexData[0],&hostVertices[0],&hostIndices[0],&hostFaces[0],&hostContacts[0],nContacts,maxContactCapacity);
02851 //                      printf("plane-convex\n");
02852                         
02853                 }
02854 
02855                         if (hostCollidables[collidableIndexA].m_shapeType == SHAPE_COMPOUND_OF_CONVEX_HULLS &&
02856                         hostCollidables[collidableIndexB].m_shapeType == SHAPE_COMPOUND_OF_CONVEX_HULLS)
02857                 {
02858                         computeContactCompoundCompound(i,bodyIndexB,bodyIndexA,collidableIndexB,collidableIndexA,&hostBodyBuf[0],
02859                         &hostCollidables[0],&hostConvexData[0],&cpuChildShapes[0], hostAabbsWorldSpace,hostAabbsLocalSpace,hostVertices,hostUniqueEdges,hostIndices,hostFaces,&hostContacts[0],
02860                         nContacts,maxContactCapacity,treeNodesCPU,subTreesCPU,bvhInfoCPU);      
02861 //                      printf("convex-plane\n");
02862                         
02863                 }
02864 
02865 
02866                                 if (hostCollidables[collidableIndexA].m_shapeType == SHAPE_COMPOUND_OF_CONVEX_HULLS &&
02867                         hostCollidables[collidableIndexB].m_shapeType == SHAPE_PLANE)
02868                 {
02869                         computeContactPlaneCompound(i,bodyIndexB,bodyIndexA,collidableIndexB,collidableIndexA,&hostBodyBuf[0],
02870                         &hostCollidables[0],&hostConvexData[0],&cpuChildShapes[0], &hostVertices[0],&hostIndices[0],&hostFaces[0],&hostContacts[0],nContacts,maxContactCapacity);
02871 //                      printf("convex-plane\n");
02872                         
02873                 }
02874 
02875                 if (hostCollidables[collidableIndexA].m_shapeType == SHAPE_PLANE &&
02876                         hostCollidables[collidableIndexB].m_shapeType == SHAPE_COMPOUND_OF_CONVEX_HULLS)
02877                 {
02878                         computeContactPlaneCompound(i,bodyIndexA,bodyIndexB,collidableIndexA,collidableIndexB,&hostBodyBuf[0],
02879                         &hostCollidables[0],&hostConvexData[0],&cpuChildShapes[0],&hostVertices[0],&hostIndices[0],&hostFaces[0],&hostContacts[0],nContacts,maxContactCapacity);
02880 //                      printf("plane-convex\n");
02881                         
02882                 }
02883 
02884                 if (hostCollidables[collidableIndexA].m_shapeType == SHAPE_CONVEX_HULL &&
02885                         hostCollidables[collidableIndexB].m_shapeType == SHAPE_CONVEX_HULL)
02886                 {
02887                         //printf("hostPairs[i].z=%d\n",hostPairs[i].z);
02888                         int contactIndex = computeContactConvexConvex2(           i,bodyIndexA,bodyIndexB,collidableIndexA,collidableIndexB,hostBodyBuf, hostCollidables,hostConvexData,hostVertices,hostUniqueEdges,hostIndices,hostFaces,hostContacts,nContacts,maxContactCapacity,oldHostContacts);
02889                         //int contactIndex = computeContactConvexConvex(hostPairs,i,bodyIndexA,bodyIndexB,collidableIndexA,collidableIndexB,hostBodyBuf,hostCollidables,hostConvexData,hostVertices,hostUniqueEdges,hostIndices,hostFaces,hostContacts,nContacts,maxContactCapacity,oldHostContacts);
02890 
02891 
02892                         if (contactIndex>=0)
02893                         {
02894 //                              printf("convex convex contactIndex = %d\n",contactIndex);
02895                                 hostPairs[i].z = contactIndex;
02896                         }
02897 //                      printf("plane-convex\n");
02898                         
02899                 }
02900 
02901 
02902         }
02903 
02904         if (hostPairs.size())
02905         {
02906                 pairs->copyFromHost(hostPairs);
02907         }
02908 
02909         hostContacts.resize(nContacts);
02910         if (nContacts)
02911                 {
02912                         
02913                         contactOut->copyFromHost(hostContacts);
02914                 } else
02915         {
02916                 contactOut->resize(0);
02917                 }
02918 
02919                 m_totalContactsOut.copyFromHostPointer(&nContacts,1,0,true);
02920                 //printf("(HOST) nContacts = %d\n",nContacts);
02921 
02922 #else
02923 
02924         {
02925                 if (nPairs)
02926                 {
02927                         m_totalContactsOut.copyFromHostPointer(&nContacts,1,0,true);
02928 
02929                         B3_PROFILE("primitiveContactsKernel");
02930                         b3BufferInfoCL bInfo[] = {
02931                                 b3BufferInfoCL( pairs->getBufferCL(), true ), 
02932                                 b3BufferInfoCL( bodyBuf->getBufferCL(),true), 
02933                                 b3BufferInfoCL( gpuCollidables.getBufferCL(),true), 
02934                                 b3BufferInfoCL( convexData.getBufferCL(),true),
02935                                 b3BufferInfoCL( gpuVertices.getBufferCL(),true),
02936                                 b3BufferInfoCL( gpuUniqueEdges.getBufferCL(),true),
02937                                 b3BufferInfoCL( gpuFaces.getBufferCL(),true),
02938                                 b3BufferInfoCL( gpuIndices.getBufferCL(),true),
02939                                 b3BufferInfoCL( contactOut->getBufferCL()),
02940                                 b3BufferInfoCL( m_totalContactsOut.getBufferCL())       
02941                         };
02942                         
02943                         b3LauncherCL launcher(m_queue, m_primitiveContactsKernel,"m_primitiveContactsKernel");
02944                         launcher.setBuffers( bInfo, sizeof(bInfo)/sizeof(b3BufferInfoCL) );
02945                         launcher.setConst( nPairs  );
02946                         launcher.setConst(maxContactCapacity);
02947                         int num = nPairs;
02948                         launcher.launch1D( num);
02949                         clFinish(m_queue);
02950                 
02951                         nContacts = m_totalContactsOut.at(0);
02952                         contactOut->resize(nContacts);
02953                 }
02954         }
02955 
02956         
02957 #endif//CHECK_ON_HOST
02958         
02959         B3_PROFILE("computeConvexConvexContactsGPUSAT");
02960    // printf("nContacts = %d\n",nContacts);
02961     
02962         
02963         m_sepNormals.resize(nPairs);
02964         m_hasSeparatingNormals.resize(nPairs);
02965         
02966         int concaveCapacity=maxTriConvexPairCapacity;
02967         m_concaveSepNormals.resize(concaveCapacity);
02968         m_concaveHasSeparatingNormals.resize(concaveCapacity);
02969         m_numConcavePairsOut.resize(0);
02970         m_numConcavePairsOut.push_back(0);
02971 
02972         
02973         m_gpuCompoundPairs.resize(compoundPairCapacity);
02974 
02975         m_gpuCompoundSepNormals.resize(compoundPairCapacity);
02976         
02977         
02978         m_gpuHasCompoundSepNormals.resize(compoundPairCapacity);
02979         
02980         m_numCompoundPairsOut.resize(0);
02981         m_numCompoundPairsOut.push_back(0);
02982 
02983         int numCompoundPairs = 0;
02984 
02985         int numConcavePairs =0;
02986 
02987         {
02988                 clFinish(m_queue);
02989                 if (findSeparatingAxisOnGpu)
02990                 {
02991                         m_dmins.resize(nPairs);
02992                         if (splitSearchSepAxisConvex)
02993                         {
02994                                         
02995 
02996                                 if (useMprGpu)
02997                                 {
02998                                         nContacts = m_totalContactsOut.at(0);
02999                                         {
03000                                                 B3_PROFILE("mprPenetrationKernel");
03001                                                 b3BufferInfoCL bInfo[] = { 
03002                                                         b3BufferInfoCL( pairs->getBufferCL(), true ), 
03003                                                         b3BufferInfoCL( bodyBuf->getBufferCL(),true), 
03004                                                         b3BufferInfoCL( gpuCollidables.getBufferCL(),true), 
03005                                                         b3BufferInfoCL( convexData.getBufferCL(),true),
03006                                                         b3BufferInfoCL( gpuVertices.getBufferCL(),true),
03007                                                         b3BufferInfoCL( m_sepNormals.getBufferCL()),
03008                                                         b3BufferInfoCL( m_hasSeparatingNormals.getBufferCL()),
03009                                                         b3BufferInfoCL( contactOut->getBufferCL()),
03010                                                         b3BufferInfoCL( m_totalContactsOut.getBufferCL())
03011                                                 };
03012 
03013                                                 b3LauncherCL launcher(m_queue, m_mprPenetrationKernel,"mprPenetrationKernel");
03014                                                 launcher.setBuffers( bInfo, sizeof(bInfo)/sizeof(b3BufferInfoCL) );
03015 
03016                                                 launcher.setConst(maxContactCapacity);
03017                                                 launcher.setConst( nPairs  );
03018 
03019                                                 int num = nPairs;
03020                                                 launcher.launch1D( num);
03021                                                 clFinish(m_queue);
03022                                                 /*
03023                                                 b3AlignedObjectArray<int>hostHasSepAxis;
03024                                                 m_hasSeparatingNormals.copyToHost(hostHasSepAxis);
03025                                                 b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Vector3>hostSepAxis;
03026                                                 m_sepNormals.copyToHost(hostSepAxis);
03027                                                 */
03028                                                 nContacts = m_totalContactsOut.at(0);
03029                                                 contactOut->resize(nContacts);
03030                                         //      printf("nContacts (after mprPenetrationKernel) = %d\n",nContacts);
03031                                                 if (nContacts>maxContactCapacity)
03032                                                 {
03033                 
03034                                                         b3Error("Error: contacts exceeds capacity (%d/%d)\n", nContacts, maxContactCapacity);
03035                                                         nContacts = maxContactCapacity;
03036                                                 }
03037 
03038                                         }
03039                                 }
03040                                 
03041                                 if (1)
03042                                 {
03043 
03044                                         if (1)
03045                                         {
03046                                         {
03047                                                 B3_PROFILE("findSeparatingAxisVertexFaceKernel");
03048                                                 b3BufferInfoCL bInfo[] = { 
03049                                                         b3BufferInfoCL( pairs->getBufferCL(), true ), 
03050                                                         b3BufferInfoCL( bodyBuf->getBufferCL(),true), 
03051                                                         b3BufferInfoCL( gpuCollidables.getBufferCL(),true), 
03052                                                         b3BufferInfoCL( convexData.getBufferCL(),true),
03053                                                         b3BufferInfoCL( gpuVertices.getBufferCL(),true),
03054                                                         b3BufferInfoCL( gpuUniqueEdges.getBufferCL(),true),
03055                                                         b3BufferInfoCL( gpuFaces.getBufferCL(),true),
03056                                                         b3BufferInfoCL( gpuIndices.getBufferCL(),true),
03057                                                         b3BufferInfoCL( clAabbsWorldSpace.getBufferCL(),true),
03058                                                         b3BufferInfoCL( m_sepNormals.getBufferCL()),
03059                                                         b3BufferInfoCL( m_hasSeparatingNormals.getBufferCL()),
03060                                                         b3BufferInfoCL( m_dmins.getBufferCL())
03061                                                 };
03062 
03063                                                 b3LauncherCL launcher(m_queue, m_findSeparatingAxisVertexFaceKernel,"findSeparatingAxisVertexFaceKernel");
03064                                                 launcher.setBuffers( bInfo, sizeof(bInfo)/sizeof(b3BufferInfoCL) );
03065                                                 launcher.setConst( nPairs  );
03066 
03067                                                 int num = nPairs;
03068                                                 launcher.launch1D( num);
03069                                                 clFinish(m_queue);
03070                                         }
03071 
03072 
03073                                         int numDirections = sizeof(unitSphere162)/sizeof(b3Vector3);
03074                                         
03075                                         {
03076                                                 B3_PROFILE("findSeparatingAxisEdgeEdgeKernel");
03077                                                 b3BufferInfoCL bInfo[] = { 
03078                                                         b3BufferInfoCL( pairs->getBufferCL(), true ), 
03079                                                         b3BufferInfoCL( bodyBuf->getBufferCL(),true), 
03080                                                         b3BufferInfoCL( gpuCollidables.getBufferCL(),true), 
03081                                                         b3BufferInfoCL( convexData.getBufferCL(),true),
03082                                                         b3BufferInfoCL( gpuVertices.getBufferCL(),true),
03083                                                         b3BufferInfoCL( gpuUniqueEdges.getBufferCL(),true),
03084                                                         b3BufferInfoCL( gpuFaces.getBufferCL(),true),
03085                                                         b3BufferInfoCL( gpuIndices.getBufferCL(),true),
03086                                                         b3BufferInfoCL( clAabbsWorldSpace.getBufferCL(),true),
03087                                                         b3BufferInfoCL( m_sepNormals.getBufferCL()),
03088                                                         b3BufferInfoCL( m_hasSeparatingNormals.getBufferCL()),
03089                                                         b3BufferInfoCL( m_dmins.getBufferCL()),
03090                                                         b3BufferInfoCL( m_unitSphereDirections.getBufferCL(),true)
03091 
03092                                                 };
03093 
03094                                                 b3LauncherCL launcher(m_queue, m_findSeparatingAxisEdgeEdgeKernel,"findSeparatingAxisEdgeEdgeKernel");
03095                                                 launcher.setBuffers( bInfo, sizeof(bInfo)/sizeof(b3BufferInfoCL) );
03096                                                 launcher.setConst( numDirections);
03097                                                 launcher.setConst( nPairs  );
03098                                                 int num = nPairs;
03099                                                 launcher.launch1D( num);
03100                                                 clFinish(m_queue);
03101 
03102                                         }
03103                                         }
03104                                         if (useMprGpu)
03105                                         {
03106                                                 B3_PROFILE("findSeparatingAxisUnitSphereKernel");
03107                                                 b3BufferInfoCL bInfo[] = { 
03108                                                                 b3BufferInfoCL( pairs->getBufferCL(), true ), 
03109                                                                 b3BufferInfoCL( bodyBuf->getBufferCL(),true), 
03110                                                                 b3BufferInfoCL( gpuCollidables.getBufferCL(),true), 
03111                                                                 b3BufferInfoCL( convexData.getBufferCL(),true),
03112                                                                 b3BufferInfoCL( gpuVertices.getBufferCL(),true),
03113                                                                 b3BufferInfoCL( m_unitSphereDirections.getBufferCL(),true),
03114                                                                 b3BufferInfoCL( m_sepNormals.getBufferCL()),
03115                                                                 b3BufferInfoCL( m_hasSeparatingNormals.getBufferCL()),
03116                                                                 b3BufferInfoCL( m_dmins.getBufferCL())
03117                                                 };
03118 
03119                                                 b3LauncherCL launcher(m_queue, m_findSeparatingAxisUnitSphereKernel,"findSeparatingAxisUnitSphereKernel");
03120                                                 launcher.setBuffers( bInfo, sizeof(bInfo)/sizeof(b3BufferInfoCL) );
03121                                                 int numDirections = sizeof(unitSphere162)/sizeof(b3Vector3);
03122                                                 launcher.setConst( numDirections);
03123 
03124                                                 launcher.setConst( nPairs  );
03125                                                 
03126                                                 int num = nPairs;
03127                                                 launcher.launch1D( num);
03128                                                 clFinish(m_queue);
03129                                         }
03130                         }
03131                                 
03132 
03133                         } else
03134                         {
03135                                 B3_PROFILE("findSeparatingAxisKernel");
03136                                 b3BufferInfoCL bInfo[] = { 
03137                                         b3BufferInfoCL( pairs->getBufferCL(), true ), 
03138                                         b3BufferInfoCL( bodyBuf->getBufferCL(),true), 
03139                                         b3BufferInfoCL( gpuCollidables.getBufferCL(),true), 
03140                                         b3BufferInfoCL( convexData.getBufferCL(),true),
03141                                         b3BufferInfoCL( gpuVertices.getBufferCL(),true),
03142                                         b3BufferInfoCL( gpuUniqueEdges.getBufferCL(),true),
03143                                         b3BufferInfoCL( gpuFaces.getBufferCL(),true),
03144                                         b3BufferInfoCL( gpuIndices.getBufferCL(),true),
03145                                         b3BufferInfoCL( clAabbsWorldSpace.getBufferCL(),true),
03146                                         b3BufferInfoCL( m_sepNormals.getBufferCL()),
03147                                         b3BufferInfoCL( m_hasSeparatingNormals.getBufferCL())
03148                                 };
03149 
03150                                 b3LauncherCL launcher(m_queue, m_findSeparatingAxisKernel,"m_findSeparatingAxisKernel");
03151                                 launcher.setBuffers( bInfo, sizeof(bInfo)/sizeof(b3BufferInfoCL) );
03152                                 launcher.setConst( nPairs  );
03153 
03154                                 int num = nPairs;
03155                                 launcher.launch1D( num);
03156                                 clFinish(m_queue);
03157                         }
03158                         
03159                         
03160                 }
03161         else
03162         {
03163             
03164                         B3_PROFILE("findSeparatingAxisKernel CPU");
03165            
03166             
03167             b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Int4> hostPairs;
03168             pairs->copyToHost(hostPairs);
03169             b3AlignedObjectArray<b3RigidBodyData> hostBodyBuf;
03170             bodyBuf->copyToHost(hostBodyBuf);
03171 
03172             b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Collidable> hostCollidables;
03173             gpuCollidables.copyToHost(hostCollidables);
03174             
03175             b3AlignedObjectArray<b3GpuChildShape> cpuChildShapes;
03176             gpuChildShapes.copyToHost(cpuChildShapes);
03177             
03178             b3AlignedObjectArray<b3ConvexPolyhedronData> hostConvexShapeData;
03179             convexData.copyToHost(hostConvexShapeData);
03180             
03181             b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Vector3> hostVertices;
03182             gpuVertices.copyToHost(hostVertices);
03183             
03184             b3AlignedObjectArray<int> hostHasSepAxis;
03185             hostHasSepAxis.resize(nPairs);
03186             b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Vector3> hostSepAxis;
03187             hostSepAxis.resize(nPairs);
03188             
03189             b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Vector3> hostUniqueEdges;
03190             gpuUniqueEdges.copyToHost(hostUniqueEdges);
03191             b3AlignedObjectArray<b3GpuFace> hostFaces;
03192             gpuFaces.copyToHost(hostFaces);
03193             
03194             b3AlignedObjectArray<int> hostIndices;
03195             gpuIndices.copyToHost(hostIndices);
03196                         
03197                         b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Contact4> hostContacts;
03198                         if (nContacts)
03199                         {
03200                                 contactOut->copyToHost(hostContacts);
03201                         }
03202                         hostContacts.resize(maxContactCapacity);
03203                         int nGlobalContactsOut = nContacts;
03204                         
03205             
03206             for (int i=0;i<nPairs;i++)
03207             {
03208                 
03209                 int bodyIndexA = hostPairs[i].x;
03210                 int bodyIndexB = hostPairs[i].y;
03211                 int collidableIndexA = hostBodyBuf[bodyIndexA].m_collidableIdx;
03212                 int collidableIndexB = hostBodyBuf[bodyIndexB].m_collidableIdx;
03213                 
03214                 int shapeIndexA = hostCollidables[collidableIndexA].m_shapeIndex;
03215                 int shapeIndexB = hostCollidables[collidableIndexB].m_shapeIndex;
03216                 
03217                 hostHasSepAxis[i] = 0;
03218                 
03219                 //once the broadphase avoids static-static pairs, we can remove this test
03220                 if ((hostBodyBuf[bodyIndexA].m_invMass==0) &&(hostBodyBuf[bodyIndexB].m_invMass==0))
03221                 {
03222                     continue;
03223                 }
03224                 
03225                 
03226                 if ((hostCollidables[collidableIndexA].m_shapeType!=SHAPE_CONVEX_HULL) ||(hostCollidables[collidableIndexB].m_shapeType!=SHAPE_CONVEX_HULL))
03227                 {
03228                     continue;
03229                 }
03230                 
03231                 float dmin = FLT_MAX;
03232                 
03233                 b3ConvexPolyhedronData* convexShapeA = &hostConvexShapeData[shapeIndexA];
03234                 b3ConvexPolyhedronData* convexShapeB = &hostConvexShapeData[shapeIndexB];
03235                 b3Vector3 posA = hostBodyBuf[bodyIndexA].m_pos;
03236                 b3Vector3 posB = hostBodyBuf[bodyIndexB].m_pos;
03237                 b3Quaternion ornA =hostBodyBuf[bodyIndexA].m_quat;
03238                 b3Quaternion ornB =hostBodyBuf[bodyIndexB].m_quat;
03239                                 
03240                                 
03241                                 if (useGjk)
03242                                 {
03243 
03244                                         //first approximate the separating axis, to 'fail-proof' GJK+EPA or MPR
03245                                         {
03246                                                 b3Vector3 c0local = hostConvexShapeData[shapeIndexA].m_localCenter;
03247                                                 b3Vector3 c0 = b3TransformPoint(c0local, posA, ornA);
03248                                                 b3Vector3 c1local = hostConvexShapeData[shapeIndexB].m_localCenter;
03249                                                 b3Vector3 c1 = b3TransformPoint(c1local,posB,ornB);
03250                                                 b3Vector3 DeltaC2 = c0 - c1;
03251                 
03252                                                 b3Vector3 sepAxis;
03253                 
03254                                                 bool hasSepAxisA = b3FindSeparatingAxis(convexShapeA, convexShapeB, posA, ornA, posB, ornB, DeltaC2,
03255                                                         &hostVertices.at(0), &hostUniqueEdges.at(0), &hostFaces.at(0), &hostIndices.at(0),
03256                                                         &hostVertices.at(0), &hostUniqueEdges.at(0), &hostFaces.at(0), &hostIndices.at(0),
03257                                                                                          &sepAxis, &dmin);
03258                 
03259                                                 if (hasSepAxisA)
03260                                                 {
03261                                                         bool hasSepAxisB = b3FindSeparatingAxis(convexShapeB, convexShapeA, posB, ornB, posA, ornA, DeltaC2,
03262                                                                                                                                         &hostVertices.at(0), &hostUniqueEdges.at(0), &hostFaces.at(0), &hostIndices.at(0),
03263                                                                                                                                         &hostVertices.at(0), &hostUniqueEdges.at(0), &hostFaces.at(0), &hostIndices.at(0),
03264                                                                                                                                         &sepAxis, &dmin);
03265                                                         if (hasSepAxisB)
03266                                                         {
03267                                                                 bool hasEdgeEdge =b3FindSeparatingAxisEdgeEdge(convexShapeA, convexShapeB, posA, ornA, posB, ornB, DeltaC2,
03268                                                                                                                          &hostVertices.at(0), &hostUniqueEdges.at(0), &hostFaces.at(0), &hostIndices.at(0),
03269                                                                                                                          &hostVertices.at(0), &hostUniqueEdges.at(0), &hostFaces.at(0), &hostIndices.at(0),
03270                                                                                                                          &sepAxis, &dmin,false);
03271                                                                                                          
03272                                                                 if (hasEdgeEdge)
03273                                                                 {
03274                                                                         hostHasSepAxis[i] = 1;
03275                                                                         hostSepAxis[i] = sepAxis;
03276                                                                         hostSepAxis[i].w = dmin;
03277                                                                 }
03278                                                         }
03279                                                 }
03280                                         }
03281 
03282                                         if (hostHasSepAxis[i])
03283                                         {
03284                                                 int pairIndex = i;
03285                                 
03286                                                 bool useMpr = true;
03287                                                 if (useMpr)
03288                                                 {
03289                                                         int res=0;
03290                                                         float depth = 0.f;
03291                                                         b3Vector3 sepAxis2 = b3MakeVector3(1,0,0);
03292                                                         b3Vector3 resultPointOnBWorld = b3MakeVector3(0,0,0);
03293 
03294                                                 float depthOut;
03295                                                 b3Vector3 dirOut;
03296                                                 b3Vector3 posOut;
03297                                                 
03298 
03299                                                 //res = b3MprPenetration(bodyIndexA,bodyIndexB,hostBodyBuf,hostConvexShapeData,hostCollidables,hostVertices,&mprConfig,&depthOut,&dirOut,&posOut);
03300                                                 res = b3MprPenetration(pairIndex,bodyIndexA,bodyIndexB,&hostBodyBuf[0],&hostConvexShapeData[0],&hostCollidables[0],&hostVertices[0],&hostSepAxis[0],&hostHasSepAxis[0],&depthOut,&dirOut,&posOut);
03301                                                 depth = depthOut;
03302                                                 sepAxis2 =  b3MakeVector3(-dirOut.x,-dirOut.y,-dirOut.z);
03303                                                 resultPointOnBWorld = posOut;
03304                                                 //hostHasSepAxis[i] = 0;
03305 
03306 
03307                                                 if (res==0)
03308                                                 {
03309                                                         //add point?
03310                                                         //printf("depth = %f\n",depth);
03311                                                         //printf("normal = %f,%f,%f\n",dir.v[0],dir.v[1],dir.v[2]);
03312                                                         //qprintf("pos = %f,%f,%f\n",pos.v[0],pos.v[1],pos.v[2]);
03313                                                 
03314                                                         
03315 
03316                                                         float dist=0.f;
03317 
03318                                                         const b3ConvexPolyhedronData& hullA = hostConvexShapeData[hostCollidables[hostBodyBuf[bodyIndexA].m_collidableIdx].m_shapeIndex];
03319                                                         const b3ConvexPolyhedronData& hullB = hostConvexShapeData[hostCollidables[hostBodyBuf[bodyIndexB].m_collidableIdx].m_shapeIndex];
03320 
03321                                                         if(b3TestSepAxis( &hullA, &hullB, posA,ornA,posB,ornB,&sepAxis2, &hostVertices[0], &hostVertices[0],&dist))
03322                                                         {
03323                                                                 if (depth > dist)
03324                                                                 {
03325                                                                         float diff = depth - dist;
03326                                                                         
03327                                                                         static float maxdiff = 0.f;
03328                                                                         if (maxdiff < diff)
03329                                                                         {
03330                                                                                 maxdiff = diff;
03331                                                                                 printf("maxdiff = %20.10f\n",maxdiff);
03332                                                                         }
03333                                                                 }
03334                                                         }
03335                                                         if (depth > dmin)
03336                                                         {
03337                                                                 b3Vector3 oldAxis = hostSepAxis[i];
03338                                                                 depth = dmin;
03339                                                                 sepAxis2 = oldAxis;
03340                                                         }
03341 
03342                                                         
03343 
03344                                                         if(b3TestSepAxis( &hullA, &hullB, posA,ornA,posB,ornB,&sepAxis2, &hostVertices[0], &hostVertices[0],&dist))
03345                                                         {
03346                                                                 if (depth > dist)
03347                                                                 {
03348                                                                         float diff = depth - dist;
03349                                                                         //printf("?diff  = %f\n",diff );
03350                                                                         static float maxdiff = 0.f;
03351                                                                         if (maxdiff < diff)
03352                                                                         {
03353                                                                                 maxdiff = diff;
03354                                                                                 printf("maxdiff = %20.10f\n",maxdiff);
03355                                                                         }
03356                                                                 }
03357                                                                 //this is used for SAT
03358                                                                 //hostHasSepAxis[i] = 1;
03359                                                                 //hostSepAxis[i] = sepAxis2;
03360 
03361                                                                 //add contact point
03362 
03363                                                                 //int contactIndex = nGlobalContactsOut;
03364                                                                 b3Contact4& newContact = hostContacts.at(nGlobalContactsOut);
03365                                                                 nGlobalContactsOut++;
03366                                                                 newContact.m_batchIdx = 0;//i;
03367                                                                 newContact.m_bodyAPtrAndSignBit = (hostBodyBuf.at(bodyIndexA).m_invMass==0)? -bodyIndexA:bodyIndexA;
03368                                                                 newContact.m_bodyBPtrAndSignBit = (hostBodyBuf.at(bodyIndexB).m_invMass==0)? -bodyIndexB:bodyIndexB;
03369 
03370                                                                 newContact.m_frictionCoeffCmp = 45874;
03371                                                                 newContact.m_restituitionCoeffCmp = 0;
03372                                                 
03373                                                                 
03374                                                                 static float maxDepth = 0.f;
03375                                                         
03376                                                                 if (depth > maxDepth)
03377                                                                 {
03378                                                                         maxDepth  = depth;
03379                                                                         printf("MPR maxdepth = %f\n",maxDepth );
03380                                                         
03381                                                                 }
03382                                                         
03383 
03384                                                                 resultPointOnBWorld.w = -depth;
03385                                                                 newContact.m_worldPosB[0] = resultPointOnBWorld;
03386                                                                 //b3Vector3 resultPointOnAWorld = resultPointOnBWorld+depth*sepAxis2;
03387                                                                 newContact.m_worldNormalOnB = sepAxis2;
03388                                                                 newContact.m_worldNormalOnB.w = (b3Scalar)1;
03389                                                         } else
03390                                                         {
03391                                                                 printf("rejected\n");
03392                                                         }
03393 
03394                         
03395                                                 }
03396                                                 } else
03397                                                 {
03398 
03399                         
03400                                 
03401                         //int contactIndex = computeContactConvexConvex2(           i,bodyIndexA,bodyIndexB,collidableIndexA,collidableIndexB,hostBodyBuf, hostCollidables,hostConvexData,hostVertices,hostUniqueEdges,hostIndices,hostFaces,hostContacts,nContacts,maxContactCapacity,oldHostContacts);
03402                                                         b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Contact4> oldHostContacts;       
03403                                                         int result;
03404                                                         result = computeContactConvexConvex2( //hostPairs,
03405                                                                                                            pairIndex,
03406                                                                                                         bodyIndexA, bodyIndexB,
03407                                                                                                            collidableIndexA, collidableIndexB,
03408                                                                                                            hostBodyBuf,
03409                                                                                                            hostCollidables,
03410                                                                                                            hostConvexShapeData,
03411                                                                                                            hostVertices,
03412                                                                                                            hostUniqueEdges,
03413                                                                                                            hostIndices,
03414                                                                                                            hostFaces,
03415                                                                                                            hostContacts,
03416                                                                                                            nGlobalContactsOut,
03417                                                                                                                 maxContactCapacity,
03418                                                                                                                 oldHostContacts
03419                                                                                                                 //hostHasSepAxis,
03420                                                                                                                 //hostSepAxis
03421                                                                                                                 
03422                                                                                                                                 );
03423                                                 }//mpr
03424                                         }//hostHasSepAxis[i] = 1;
03425                                         
03426                                 } else
03427                                 {
03428                                 
03429                                         b3Vector3 c0local = hostConvexShapeData[shapeIndexA].m_localCenter;
03430                                         b3Vector3 c0 = b3TransformPoint(c0local, posA, ornA);
03431                                         b3Vector3 c1local = hostConvexShapeData[shapeIndexB].m_localCenter;
03432                                         b3Vector3 c1 = b3TransformPoint(c1local,posB,ornB);
03433                                         b3Vector3 DeltaC2 = c0 - c1;
03434                 
03435                                         b3Vector3 sepAxis;
03436                 
03437                                         bool hasSepAxisA = b3FindSeparatingAxis(convexShapeA, convexShapeB, posA, ornA, posB, ornB, DeltaC2,
03438                                                 &hostVertices.at(0), &hostUniqueEdges.at(0), &hostFaces.at(0), &hostIndices.at(0),
03439                                                 &hostVertices.at(0), &hostUniqueEdges.at(0), &hostFaces.at(0), &hostIndices.at(0),
03440                                                                                  &sepAxis, &dmin);
03441                 
03442                                         if (hasSepAxisA)
03443                                         {
03444                                                 bool hasSepAxisB = b3FindSeparatingAxis(convexShapeB, convexShapeA, posB, ornB, posA, ornA, DeltaC2,
03445                                                                                                                                 &hostVertices.at(0), &hostUniqueEdges.at(0), &hostFaces.at(0), &hostIndices.at(0),
03446                                                                                                                                 &hostVertices.at(0), &hostUniqueEdges.at(0), &hostFaces.at(0), &hostIndices.at(0),
03447                                                                                                                                 &sepAxis, &dmin);
03448                                                 if (hasSepAxisB)
03449                                                 {
03450                                                         bool hasEdgeEdge =b3FindSeparatingAxisEdgeEdge(convexShapeA, convexShapeB, posA, ornA, posB, ornB, DeltaC2,
03451                                                                                                                  &hostVertices.at(0), &hostUniqueEdges.at(0), &hostFaces.at(0), &hostIndices.at(0),
03452                                                                                                                  &hostVertices.at(0), &hostUniqueEdges.at(0), &hostFaces.at(0), &hostIndices.at(0),
03453                                                                                                                  &sepAxis, &dmin,true);
03454                                                                                                          
03455                                                         if (hasEdgeEdge)
03456                                                         {
03457                                                                 hostHasSepAxis[i] = 1;
03458                                                                 hostSepAxis[i] = sepAxis;
03459                                                         }
03460                                                 }
03461                                         }
03462                                 }
03463             }
03464             
03465                         if (useGjkContacts)//nGlobalContactsOut>0)
03466                         {
03467                                 //printf("nGlobalContactsOut=%d\n",nGlobalContactsOut);
03468                                 nContacts = nGlobalContactsOut;
03469                                 contactOut->copyFromHost(hostContacts);
03470         
03471                                 m_totalContactsOut.copyFromHostPointer(&nContacts,1,0,true);
03472                         }
03473             
03474             m_hasSeparatingNormals.copyFromHost(hostHasSepAxis);
03475             m_sepNormals.copyFromHost(hostSepAxis);
03476         
03477             /*
03478              //double-check results from GPU (comment-out the 'else' so both paths are executed
03479             b3AlignedObjectArray<int> checkHasSepAxis;

03481             static int frameCount = 0;
03482             frameCount++;

03488                            frameCount,i,hostHasSepAxis[i],checkHasSepAxis[i]);

03490             }

03492             //    m_sepNormals.copyFromHost(hostSepAxis);

03494         }
03495         
03496         
03497         numCompoundPairs = m_numCompoundPairsOut.at(0);
03498         bool useGpuFindCompoundPairs=true;
03499         if (useGpuFindCompoundPairs)
03500         {
03501             B3_PROFILE("findCompoundPairsKernel");
03502             b3BufferInfoCL bInfo[] = 
03503             {

03505                 b3BufferInfoCL( bodyBuf->getBufferCL(),true),

03510                 b3BufferInfoCL( gpuFaces.getBufferCL(),true),

03512                 b3BufferInfoCL( clAabbsLocalSpace.getBufferCL(),true),
03513                 b3BufferInfoCL( gpuChildShapes.getBufferCL(),true),
03514                 b3BufferInfoCL( m_gpuCompoundPairs.getBufferCL()),
03515                 b3BufferInfoCL( m_numCompoundPairsOut.getBufferCL()),
03516                 b3BufferInfoCL(subTreesGPU->getBufferCL()),
03517                 b3BufferInfoCL(treeNodesGPU->getBufferCL()),
03518                 b3BufferInfoCL(bvhInfo->getBufferCL())
03519             };
03520 
03521             b3LauncherCL launcher(m_queue, m_findCompoundPairsKernel,"m_findCompoundPairsKernel");
03522             launcher.setBuffers( bInfo, sizeof(bInfo)/sizeof(b3BufferInfoCL) );
03523             launcher.setConst( nPairs  );
03524             launcher.setConst( compoundPairCapacity);
03525

03527             launcher.launch1D( num);
03528             clFinish(m_queue);
03529 
03530             numCompoundPairs = m_numCompoundPairsOut.at(0);
03531             //printf("numCompoundPairs =%d\n",numCompoundPairs );
03532             if (numCompoundPairs)
03533             {
03534                 //printf("numCompoundPairs=%d\n",numCompoundPairs);
03535             }
03536             
03537 
03538         } else
03539         {
03540 
03541 
03542             b3AlignedObjectArray<b3QuantizedBvhNode>    treeNodesCPU;
03543             treeNodesGPU->copyToHost(treeNodesCPU);
03544

03546             subTreesGPU->copyToHost(subTreesCPU);
03547

03549             bvhInfo->copyToHost(bvhInfoCPU);

03552             clAabbsWorldSpace.copyToHost(hostAabbsWorldSpace);

03555             clAabbsLocalSpace.copyToHost(hostAabbsLocalSpace);

03558             pairs->copyToHost(hostPairs);

03561             bodyBuf->copyToHost(hostBodyBuf);

03565             cpuCompoundPairsOut.resize(compoundPairCapacity);

03568             gpuCollidables.copyToHost(hostCollidables);

03571             gpuChildShapes.copyToHost(cpuChildShapes);

03724                 //now perform the tree query on GPU
03725

03728
